VS1053B full function driver
driver_vs1053b.c
Go to the documentation of this file.

180 #define CHIP_NAME "VLSI VS1053B"
181 #define MANUFACTURER_NAME "VLSI"
182 #define SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MIN 2.6f
183 #define SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MAX 3.6f
184 #define MAX_CURRENT 60.0f
185 #define TEMPERATURE_MIN -40.0f
186 #define TEMPERATURE_MAX 85.0f
187 #define DRIVER_VERSION 1000
192 #define VS1053B_COMMAND_READ 0x03
193 #define VS1053B_COMMAND_WRITE 0x02
198 #define VS1053B_REG_MODE 0x00
199 #define VS1053B_REG_STATUS 0x01
200 #define VS1053B_REG_BASS 0x02
201 #define VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF 0x03
202 #define VS1053B_REG_DECODE_TIME 0x04
203 #define VS1053B_REG_AUDATA 0x05
204 #define VS1053B_REG_WRAM 0x06
205 #define VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR 0x07
206 #define VS1053B_REG_HDAT0 0x08
207 #define VS1053B_REG_HDAT1 0x09
208 #define VS1053B_REG_AIADDR 0x0A
209 #define VS1053B_REG_VOL 0x0B
210 #define VS1053B_REG_AICTRL0 0x0C
211 #define VS1053B_REG_AICTRL1 0x0D
212 #define VS1053B_REG_AICTRL2 0x0E
213 #define VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3 0x0F
218 #define VS1053B_STATUS_STOP 0x00
219 #define VS1053B_STATUS_PLAY 0x01
220 #define VS1053B_STATUS_RECORD 0x02
225 #define MIN(a, b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
238 static uint8_t a_vs1053b_spi_read(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
239 {
240  if (handle->spi_cmd_read_address16(((uint16_t)(VS1053B_COMMAND_READ) << 8) | reg, buf, len) != 0) /* spi read */
241  {
242  return 1; /* return error */
243  }
244  else
245  {
246  return 0; /* success return 0 */
247  }
248 }
249 
261 static uint8_t a_vs1053b_spi_write(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
262 {
263  if (handle->spi_cmd_write_address16(((uint16_t)(VS1053B_COMMAND_WRITE) << 8) | reg, buf, len) != 0) /* spi write */
264  {
265  return 1; /* return error */
266  }
267  else
268  {
269  return 0; /* success return 0 */
270  }
271 }
272 
283 static uint8_t a_vs1053b_spi_write_data(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
284 {
285  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd(buf, len) != 0) /* spi write */
286  {
287  return 1; /* return error */
288  }
289  else
290  {
291  return 0; /* success return 0 */
292  }
293 }
294 
304 static uint8_t a_check_busy_pin(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
305 {
306  uint16_t i;
307  uint8_t dat;
308 
309  for (i = 0; i < 1000; i++) /* up to 1000ms */
310  {
311  if (handle->dreq_gpio_read(&dat) != 0) /* read failed */
312  {
313  return 2; /* return error */
314  }
315  if (dat != 0) /* if high */
316  {
317  break; /* break */
318  }
319 
320  handle->delay_ms(1); /* delay 1ms */
321  }
322 
323  if (i < 1000) /* check up to 1000ms */
324  {
325  return 0; /* success return 0 */
326  }
327  else
328  {
329  return 1; /* return error */
330  }
331 }
332 
341 static uint8_t a_vs1053b_stop(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
342 {
343  uint8_t res;
344  uint8_t dat0;
345  uint8_t dat1;
346  uint8_t buf[2];
347  uint8_t buf_init[32];
348  uint16_t i;
349  uint16_t prev;
350 
351  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
352  {
353  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
354 
355  return 1; /* return error */
356  }
357  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
358  if (res != 0) /* check result */
359  {
360  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
361 
362  return 1; /* return error */
363  }
364  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
365  prev &= ~(1 << 3); /* clear the settings */
366  prev |= 1 << 3; /* set the config */
367  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
368  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
369  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
370  if (res != 0) /* check result */
371  {
372  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
373 
374  return 1; /* return error */
375  }
376 
377  memset(buf_init, 0, sizeof(uint8_t) * 32); /* init */
378  for (i = 0; i < 64; i++) /* 64 times */
379  {
380  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd(buf_init, 32) != 0) /* push data */
381  {
382  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: fill buffer failed.\n"); /* fill buffer failed */
383 
384  return 1; /* return error */
385  }
386  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
387  {
388  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
389 
390  return 1; /* return error */
391  }
392  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
393  if (res != 0) /* check result */
394  {
395  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
396 
397  return 1; /* return error */
398  }
399  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
400  if ((prev & (1 << 3)) == 0) /* check cancel bit */
401  {
402  break; /* break */
403  }
404  }
405  if (i >= 64) /* check times */
406  {
407  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: cancel bit is invalid.\n"); /* cancel bit is invalid */
408 
409  return 1; /* return error */
410  }
411 
412  for (i = 0; i < 65; i++) /* 65 times */
413  {
414  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
415  {
416  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
417 
418  return 1; /* return error */
419  }
420  prev = 0x1E06; /* set addr */
421  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
422  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
423  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle,
424  VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
425  if (res != 0) /* check result */
426  {
427  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
428 
429  return 1; /* return error */
430  }
431  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
432  {
433  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
434 
435  return 1; /* return error */
436  }
437  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
438  if (res != 0) /* check result */
439  {
440  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
441 
442  return 1; /* return error */
443  }
444  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
445  memset(buf_init, prev & 0xFF, sizeof(uint8_t) * 32); /* init */
446  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd(buf_init, 32) != 0) /* push data */
447  {
448  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: fill buffer failed.\n"); /* fill buffer failed */
449 
450  return 1; /* return error */
451  }
452  }
453 
454  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
455  {
456  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
457 
458  return 1; /* return error */
459  }
460  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
461  if (res != 0) /* check result */
462  {
463  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
464 
465  return 1; /* return error */
466  }
467  dat0 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
468  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
469  if (res != 0) /* check result */
470  {
471  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
472 
473  return 1; /* return error */
474  }
475  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
476  if ((dat0 != 0) || (dat1 != 0)) /* check dat0 */
477  {
478  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: dat0 and dat1 ara invalid.\n"); /* dat0 and dat1 ara invalid */
479 
480  return 1; /* return error */
481  }
482 
483  return 0; /* success return 0 */
484 }
485 
491 static void a_period(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
492 {
493  if (handle->period_enable != 0) /* if enable */
494  {
495  uint32_t sec;
496  uint32_t us;
497  uint64_t current_time;
498 
499  handle->timestamp_read(&sec, &us); /* read timestamp */
500  current_time = (((uint64_t)sec) * 1000000 + ((uint64_t)us)); /* create timestamp */
501  if (current_time - handle->timestamp >= handle->period) /* check period */
502  {
503  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* if not null */
504  {
505  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PERIOD, handle->cur_pos); /* run the callback */
506  }
507  handle->timestamp = current_time; /* save the current timestamp */
508  }
509  }
510 }
511 
521 static uint8_t a_vs1053b_write_wav_header(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_wav_t *wav)
522 {
523  uint8_t res;
524  uint8_t buf[44];
525 
526  buf[0] = handle->wav.chunk_id[0]; /* R */
527  buf[1] = handle->wav.chunk_id[1]; /* I */
528  buf[2] = handle->wav.chunk_id[2]; /* F */
529  buf[3] = handle->wav.chunk_id[3]; /* F */
530  buf[4] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
531  buf[5] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
532  buf[6] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 16) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
533  buf[7] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 24) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
534  buf[8] = handle->wav.format[0]; /* W */
535  buf[9] = handle->wav.format[1]; /* A */
536  buf[10] = handle->wav.format[2]; /* V */
537  buf[11] = handle->wav.format[3]; /* E */
538  buf[12] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[0]; /* f */
539  buf[13] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[1]; /* m */
540  buf[14] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[2]; /* t */
541  buf[15] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[3]; /* 0x00 */
542  buf[16] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
543  buf[17] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
544  buf[18] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 16) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
545  buf[19] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 24) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
546  buf[20] = (handle->wav.audio_format >> 0) & 0xFF; /* pcm */
547  buf[21] = (handle->wav.audio_format >> 8) & 0xFF; /* pcm */
548  buf[22] = (handle->wav.num_channel >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 1 channel */
549  buf[23] = (handle->wav.num_channel >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 1 channel */
550  buf[24] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
551  buf[25] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
552  buf[26] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 16) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
553  buf[27] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 24) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
554  buf[28] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 0) & 0xFF; /* double */
555  buf[29] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 8) & 0xFF; /* double */
556  buf[30] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 16) & 0xFF; /* double */
557  buf[31] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 24) & 0xFF; /* double */
558  buf[32] = (handle->wav.block_align >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 2 bytes */
559  buf[33] = (handle->wav.block_align >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 2 bytes */
560  buf[34] = (handle->wav.bit_per_sample >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 16 bits */
561  buf[35] = (handle->wav.bit_per_sample >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 16 bits */
562  buf[36] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[0]; /* d */
563  buf[37] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[1]; /* a */
564  buf[38] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[2]; /* t */
565  buf[39] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[3]; /* a */
566  buf[40] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 0) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
567  buf[41] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 8) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
568  buf[42] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 16) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
569  buf[43] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 24) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
570  res = handle->audio_write(0, 44, buf); /* write buffer */
571  if (res != 0) /* check result */
572  {
573  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
574 
575  return 1; /* return error */
576  }
577 
578  return 0; /* success return 0 */
579 }
580 
592 uint8_t vs1053b_set_diff(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_diff_t diff)
593 {
594  uint8_t res;
595  uint8_t buf[2];
596  uint16_t prev;
597 
598  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
599  {
600  return 2; /* return error */
601  }
602  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
603  {
604  return 3; /* return error */
605  }
606  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
607  {
608  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
609 
610  return 1; /* return error */
611  }
612 
613  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
614  if (res != 0) /* check result */
615  {
616  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
617 
618  return 1; /* return error */
619  }
620  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
621  prev &= ~(1 << 0); /* clear the settings */
622  prev |= diff << 0; /* set the config */
623  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
624  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
625  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
626  if (res != 0) /* check result */
627  {
628  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
629 
630  return 1; /* return error */
631  }
632 
633  return 0; /* success return 0 */
634 }
635 
647 uint8_t vs1053b_get_diff(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_diff_t *diff)
648 {
649  uint8_t res;
650  uint8_t buf[2];
651  uint16_t prev;
652 
653  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
654  {
655  return 2; /* return error */
656  }
657  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
658  {
659  return 3; /* return error */
660  }
661  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
662  {
663  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
664 
665  return 1; /* return error */
666  }
667 
668  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
669  if (res != 0) /* check result */
670  {
671  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
672 
673  return 1; /* return error */
674  }
675  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
676  *diff = (vs1053b_diff_t)((prev >> 0) & 0x01); /* get the diff */
677 
678  return 0; /* success return 0 */
679 }
680 
692 uint8_t vs1053b_set_mpeg_layer_i_and_ii(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
693 {
694  uint8_t res;
695  uint8_t buf[2];
696  uint16_t prev;
697 
698  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
699  {
700  return 2; /* return error */
701  }
702  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
703  {
704  return 3; /* return error */
705  }
706  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
707  {
708  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
709 
710  return 1; /* return error */
711  }
712 
713  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
714  if (res != 0) /* check result */
715  {
716  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
717 
718  return 1; /* return error */
719  }
720  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
721  prev &= ~(1 << 1); /* clear the settings */
722  prev |= enable << 1; /* set the config */
723  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
724  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
725  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
726  if (res != 0) /* check result */
727  {
728  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
729 
730  return 1; /* return error */
731  }
732 
733  return 0; /* success return 0 */
734 }
735 
747 uint8_t vs1053b_get_mpeg_layer_i_and_ii(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t *enable)
748 {
749  uint8_t res;
750  uint8_t buf[2];
751  uint16_t prev;

756  }

758  {
759  return 3; /* return error */
760  }

762  {

764 
765  return 1; /* return error */
766  }
767

769  if (res != 0) /* check result */
770  {
771  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
772 
773  return 1; /* return error */
774  }
775  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
776  *enable = (vs1053b_bool_t)((prev >> 1) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
777 
778  return 0; /* success return 0 */
779 }
780 
792 uint8_t vs1053b_set_soft_reset(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
793 {
794  uint8_t res;
795  uint8_t buf[2];
796  uint16_t prev;
797 
798  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
799  {
800  return 2; /* return error */
801  }
802  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
803  {
804  return 3; /* return error */
805  }
806  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
807  {
808  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
809 
810  return 1; /* return error */
811  }
812 
813  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
814  if (res != 0) /* check result */
815  {
816  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
817 
818  return 1; /* return error */
819  }
820  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
821  prev &= ~(1 << 2); /* clear the settings */
822  prev |= enable << 2; /* set the config */
823  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
824  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
825  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
826  if (res != 0) /* check result */
827  {
828  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
829 
830  return 1; /* return error */
831  }
832  handle->delay_ms(2); /* delay 2ms */
833 
834  return 0; /* success return 0 */
835 }
836

866  return 1; /* return error */
867  }
868

871  {
872  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
873 
874  return 1; /* return error */
875  }

912  }

918 
919  return 1; /* return error */
920  }

922  prev &= ~(1 << 3); /* clear the settings */
923  prev |= enable << 3; /* set the config */
924  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
925  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */

928  {

930 
931  return 1; /* return error */
932  }
933 
934  return 0; /* success return 0 */

1012  }

1017  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1018 
1019  return 1; /* return error */
1020  }
1021  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1022  prev &= ~(1 << 4); /* clear the settings */
1023  prev |= enable << 4; /* set the config */
1024  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
1025  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */

1032  }

1194 {

1199  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1200  {
1201  return 2; /* return error */
1202  }

1204  {
1205  return 3; /* return error */
1206  }
1207  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
1208  {
1209  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1210 
1211  return 1; /* return error */
1212  }
1213

1215  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1216  {
1217  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1218 
1219  return 1; /* return error */
1220  }
1221  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1222  prev &= ~(1 << 6); /* clear the settings */
1223  prev |= enable << 6; /* set the config */
1224  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
1225  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
1226  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
1227  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1228  {
1229  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
1230 
1231  return 1; /* return error */
1232  }

1234  return 0; /* success return 0 */

1381 
1393 uint8_t vs1053b_set_dclk_edge(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_dclk_edge_t edge)
1394 {
1395  uint8_t res;
1396  uint8_t buf[2];
1397  uint16_t prev;
1398 
1399  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1400  {
1401  return 2; /* return error */
1402  }
1403  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1404  {
1405  return 3; /* return error */
1406  }
1407  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
1408  {
1409  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1410 
1411  return 1; /* return error */
1412  }
1413 
1414  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
1415  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1416  {
1417  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1418 
1419  return 1; /* return error */
1420  }
1421  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1422  prev &= ~(1 << 8); /* clear the settings */
1423  prev |= edge << 8; /* set the config */
1424  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
1425  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
1426  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
1427  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1428  {
1429  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
1430 
1431  return 1; /* return error */
1432  }
1433 
1434  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1435 }
1436 
1448 uint8_t vs1053b_get_dclk_edge(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_dclk_edge_t *edge)
1449 {
1450  uint8_t res;
1451  uint8_t buf[2];
1452  uint16_t prev;
1453 
1454  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1455  {
1456  return 2; /* return error */
1457  }
1458  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1459  {
1460  return 3; /* return error */
1461  }
1462  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
1463  {
1464  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1465 
1466  return 1; /* return error */
1467  }
1468 
1469  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
1470  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1471  {
1472  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1473 
1474  return 1; /* return error */
1475  }
1476  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1477  *edge = (vs1053b_dclk_edge_t)((prev >> 8) & 0x01); /* get the edge */
1478 
1479  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1480 }
1481 
1493 uint8_t vs1053b_set_sdi_bit_order(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bit_order_t order)
1494 {
1495  uint8_t res;
1496  uint8_t buf[2];
1497  uint16_t prev;
1498 
1499  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1500  {
1501  return 2; /* return error */
1502  }
1503  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1504  {
1505  return 3; /* return error */
1506  }
1507  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
1508  {
1509  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1510 
1511  return 1; /* return error */
1512  }
1513 
1514  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
1515  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1516  {
1517  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1518 
1519  return 1; /* return error */
1520  }
1521  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1522  prev &= ~(1 << 9); /* clear the settings */
1523  prev |= order << 9; /* set the config */
1524  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
1525  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
1526  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
1527  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1528  {
1529  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
1530 
1531  return 1; /* return error */
1532  }
1533 
1534  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1535 }
1536

1560  return 3; /* return error */
1561  }

1563  {
1564  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1565 
1566  return 1; /* return error */
1567  }
1568 
1569  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
1570  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1571  {
1572  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1573 
1574  return 1; /* return error */
1575  }
1576  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1577  *order = (vs1053b_bit_order_t)((prev >> 9) & 0x01); /* get the order */
1578 
1579  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1580 }

1593 uint8_t vs1053b_set_share_spi_chip_select(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
1594 {
1595  uint8_t res;
1596  uint8_t buf[2];
1597  uint16_t prev;
1598 
1599  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1600  {
1601  return 2; /* return error */
1602  }
1603  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1604  {
1605  return 3; /* return error */
1606  }
1607  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
1608  {
1609  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1610 
1611  return 1; /* return error */
1612  }
1613 
1614  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
1615  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1616  {
1617  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1618 
1619  return 1; /* return error */
1620  }
1621  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1622  prev &= ~(1 << 10); /* clear the settings */
1623  prev |= enable << 10; /* set the config */
1624  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
1625  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
1626  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
1627  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1628  {
1629  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
1630 
1631  return 1; /* return error */
1632  }
1633 
1634  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1635 }

1700  {
1701  return 2; /* return error */
1702  }

1704  {
1705  return 3; /* return error */
1706  }
1707  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
1708  {
1709  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1710 
1711  return 1; /* return error */
1712  }
1713

1715  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1716  {
1717  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1718 
1719  return 1; /* return error */
1720  }
1721  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1722  prev &= ~(1 << 11); /* clear the settings */
1723  prev |= enable << 11; /* set the config */
1724  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
1725  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */

1727  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1728  {
1729  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
1730 
1731  return 1; /* return error */
1732  }
1733 
1734  return 0; /* success return 0 */

1893 uint8_t vs1053b_set_selector(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_selector_t selector)
1894 {
1895  uint8_t res;
1896  uint8_t buf[2];
1897  uint16_t prev;
1898 
1899  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
1900  {
1901  return 2; /* return error */
1902  }
1903  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
1904  {
1905  return 3; /* return error */
1906  }
1907  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
1908  {
1909  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
1910 
1911  return 1; /* return error */
1912  }
1913 
1914  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
1915  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1916  {
1917  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
1918 
1919  return 1; /* return error */
1920  }
1921  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
1922  prev &= ~(1 << 14); /* clear the settings */
1923  prev |= selector << 14; /* set the config */
1924  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
1925  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
1926  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
1927  if (res != 0) /* check result */
1928  {
1929  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
1930 
1931  return 1; /* return error */
1932  }
1933 
1934  return 0; /* success return 0 */
1935 }

1993 uint8_t vs1053b_set_clock_range(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_clock_range_t range)
1994 {
1995  uint8_t res;
1996  uint8_t buf[2];
1997  uint16_t prev;
1998 
1999  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2000  {
2001  return 2; /* return error */
2002  }
2003  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2004  {
2005  return 3; /* return error */
2006  }
2007  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2008  {
2009  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2010 
2011  return 1; /* return error */
2012  }
2013 
2014  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
2015  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2016  {
2017  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
2018 
2019  return 1; /* return error */
2020  }
2021  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2022  prev &= ~(1 << 15); /* clear the settings */
2023  prev |= range << 15; /* set the config */
2024  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2025  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
2026  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
2027  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2028  {
2029  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
2030 
2031  return 1; /* return error */
2032  }
2033 
2034  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2035 }

2093 uint8_t vs1053b_set_do_not_jump(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
2094 {
2095  uint8_t res;
2096  uint8_t buf[2];
2097  uint16_t prev;
2098 
2099  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2100  {
2101  return 2; /* return error */
2102  }
2103  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2104  {
2105  return 3; /* return error */
2106  }
2107  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2108  {
2109  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2110 
2111  return 1; /* return error */
2112  }
2113 
2114  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2115  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2116  {
2117  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2118 
2119  return 1; /* return error */
2120  }
2121  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2122  prev &= ~(1 << 15); /* clear the settings */
2123  prev |= enable << 15; /* set the config */
2124  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2125  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
2126  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* write the status */
2127  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2128  {
2129  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write status failed.\n"); /* write status failed */
2130 
2131  return 1; /* return error */
2132  }
2133 
2134  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2135 }

2194 uint8_t vs1053b_set_swing(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t swing)
2195 {
2196  uint8_t res;
2197  uint8_t buf[2];
2198  uint16_t prev;
2199 
2200  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2201  {
2202  return 2; /* return error */
2203  }
2204  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2205  {
2206  return 3; /* return error */
2207  }
2208  if (swing > 7) /* check swing */
2209  {
2210  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: swing > 7.\n"); /* swing > 7 */
2211 
2212  return 4; /* return error */
2213  }
2214  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2215  {
2216  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2217 
2218  return 1; /* return error */
2219  }
2220 
2221  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2222  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2223  {
2224  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2225 
2226  return 1; /* return error */
2227  }
2228  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2229  prev &= ~(0x07 << 12); /* clear the settings */
2230  prev |= swing << 12; /* set the config */
2231  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2232  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
2233  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* write the status */
2234  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2235  {
2236  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write status failed.\n"); /* write status failed */
2237 
2238  return 1; /* return error */
2239  }
2240 
2241  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2242 }
2243 
2255 uint8_t vs1053b_get_swing(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *swing)
2256 {
2257  uint8_t res;
2258  uint8_t buf[2];
2259  uint16_t prev;
2260 
2261  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2262  {
2263  return 2; /* return error */
2264  }
2265  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2266  {
2267  return 3; /* return error */
2268  }
2269  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2270  {
2271  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2272 
2273  return 1; /* return error */
2274  }
2275 
2276  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2277  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2278  {
2279  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2280 
2281  return 1; /* return error */
2282  }
2283  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2284  *swing = (vs1053b_bool_t)((prev >> 12) & 0x07); /* get the swing */
2285 
2286  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2287 }
2288 
2300 uint8_t vs1053b_swing_convert_to_register(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, float db, uint8_t *reg)
2301 {
2302  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2303  {
2304  return 2; /* return error */
2305  }
2306  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2307  {
2308  return 3; /* return error */
2309  }
2310 
2311  *reg = (uint8_t)(db / 2.0f); /* convert real data to register data */
2312 
2313  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2314 }
2315 
2327 uint8_t vs1053b_swing_convert_to_data(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, float *db)
2328 {
2329  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2330  {
2331  return 2; /* return error */
2332  }
2333  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2334  {
2335  return 3; /* return error */
2336  }
2337 
2338  *db = (float)(reg) / 0.5f; /* convert raw data to real data */
2339 
2340  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2341 }
2342 
2354 uint8_t vs1053b_set_overload_indicator(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
2355 {
2356  uint8_t res;
2357  uint8_t buf[2];
2358  uint16_t prev;
2359 
2360  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2361  {
2362  return 2; /* return error */
2363  }
2364  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2365  {
2366  return 3; /* return error */
2367  }
2368  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2369  {
2370  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2371 
2372  return 1; /* return error */
2373  }
2374 
2375  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2376  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2377  {
2378  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2379 
2380  return 1; /* return error */
2381  }
2382  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2383  prev &= ~(1 << 11); /* clear the settings */
2384  prev |= enable << 11; /* set the config */
2385  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2386  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
2387  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* write the status */
2388  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2389  {
2390  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write status failed.\n"); /* write status failed */
2391 
2392  return 1; /* return error */
2393  }
2394 
2395  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2396 }
2397

2410 {
2411  uint8_t res;
2412  uint8_t buf[2];
2413  uint16_t prev;
2414 
2415  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2416  {
2417  return 2; /* return error */
2418  }
2419  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2420  {
2421  return 3; /* return error */
2422  }
2423  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2424  {
2425  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2426 
2427  return 1; /* return error */
2428  }
2429 
2430  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2431  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2432  {
2433  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2434 
2435  return 1; /* return error */
2436  }
2437  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2438  *enable = (vs1053b_bool_t)((prev >> 11) & 0x01); /* get the bool */
2439 
2440  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2441 }

2454 uint8_t vs1053b_set_overload_detection(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
2455 {
2456  uint8_t res;
2457  uint8_t buf[2];
2458  uint16_t prev;
2459 
2460  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2461  {
2462  return 2; /* return error */
2463  }
2464  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2465  {
2466  return 3; /* return error */
2467  }
2468  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2469  {
2470  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2471 
2472  return 1; /* return error */
2473  }
2474 
2475  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2476  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2477  {
2478  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2479 
2480  return 1; /* return error */
2481  }
2482  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2483  prev &= ~(1 << 10); /* clear the settings */
2484  prev |= (!enable) << 10; /* set the config */
2485  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2486  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
2487  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* write the status */
2488  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2489  {
2490  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write status failed.\n"); /* write status failed */
2491 
2492  return 1; /* return error */
2493  }
2494 
2495  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2496 }
2497 
2509 uint8_t vs1053b_get_overload_detection(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t *enable)
2510 {
2511  uint8_t res;
2512  uint8_t buf[2];
2513  uint16_t prev;
2514 
2515  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2516  {
2517  return 2; /* return error */
2518  }
2519  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2520  {
2521  return 3; /* return error */
2522  }
2523  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2524  {
2525  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2526 
2527  return 1; /* return error */
2528  }
2529 
2530  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2531  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2532  {
2533  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2534 
2535  return 1; /* return error */
2536  }
2537  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2538  *enable = (vs1053b_bool_t)(!((prev >> 10) & 0x01)); /* get the bool */
2539 
2540  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2541 }

2559

2561  {
2562  return 2; /* return error */
2563  }
2564  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2565  {
2566  return 3; /* return error */
2567  }
2568  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2569  {
2570  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2571 
2572  return 1; /* return error */
2573  }

2577  {
2578  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2579 
2580  return 1; /* return error */
2581  }
2582  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2583  *version = (vs1053b_bool_t)((prev >> 4) & 0x0F); /* get the swing */
2584 
2585  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2586 }

2623  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2624 
2625  return 1; /* return error */
2626  }

2630  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2631  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */

2638  }

2799 uint8_t vs1053b_set_ad_clock(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_ad_clock_t ad_clock)
2800 {
2801  uint8_t res;
2802  uint8_t buf[2];
2803  uint16_t prev;
2804 
2805  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2806  {
2807  return 2; /* return error */
2808  }
2809  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2810  {
2811  return 3; /* return error */
2812  }
2813  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2814  {
2815  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2816 
2817  return 1; /* return error */
2818  }
2819 
2820  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2821  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2822  {
2823  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2824 
2825  return 1; /* return error */
2826  }
2827  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2828  prev &= ~(1 << 1); /* clear the settings */
2829  prev |= ad_clock << 1; /* set the config */
2830  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2831  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
2832  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* write the status */
2833  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2834  {
2835  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write status failed.\n"); /* write status failed */
2836 
2837  return 1; /* return error */
2838  }
2839 
2840  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2841 }

2871 
2872  return 1; /* return error */
2873  }

2899 uint8_t vs1053b_set_reference_voltage(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_reference_voltage_t voltage)
2900 {
2901  uint8_t res;
2902  uint8_t buf[2];
2903  uint16_t prev;
2904 
2905  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2906  {
2907  return 2; /* return error */
2908  }
2909  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2910  {
2911  return 3; /* return error */
2912  }
2913  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2914  {
2915  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2916 
2917  return 1; /* return error */
2918  }
2919 
2920  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2921  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2922  {
2923  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2924 
2925  return 1; /* return error */
2926  }
2927  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2928  prev &= ~(1 << 0); /* clear the settings */
2929  prev |= voltage << 0; /* set the config */
2930  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
2931  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
2932  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* write the status */
2933  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2934  {
2935  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write status failed.\n"); /* write status failed */
2936 
2937  return 1; /* return error */
2938  }
2939 
2940  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2941 }
2942 
2954 uint8_t vs1053b_get_reference_voltage(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_reference_voltage_t *voltage)
2955 {
2956  uint8_t res;
2957  uint8_t buf[2];
2958  uint16_t prev;
2959 
2960  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
2961  {
2962  return 2; /* return error */
2963  }
2964  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
2965  {
2966  return 3; /* return error */
2967  }
2968  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
2969  {
2970  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
2971 
2972  return 1; /* return error */
2973  }
2974 
2975  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_STATUS, buf, 2); /* read the status */
2976  if (res != 0) /* check result */
2977  {
2978  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read status failed.\n"); /* read status failed */
2979 
2980  return 1; /* return error */
2981  }
2982  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
2983  *voltage = (vs1053b_reference_voltage_t)((prev >> 0) & 0x01); /* get the voltage */
2984 
2985  return 0; /* success return 0 */
2986 }
2987 
3000 uint8_t vs1053b_set_treble_control(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t db)
3001 {
3002  uint8_t res;
3003  uint8_t buf[2];
3004  uint16_t prev;
3005 
3006  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3007  {
3008  return 2; /* return error */
3009  }
3010  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3011  {
3012  return 3; /* return error */
3013  }
3014  if (db > 15) /* check db */
3015  {
3016  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: db > 15.\n"); /* db > 15 */
3017 
3018  return 4; /* return error */
3019  }
3020  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3021  {
3022  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3023 
3024  return 1; /* return error */
3025  }
3026 
3027  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_BASS, buf, 2); /* read the bass */
3028  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3029  {
3030  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read bass failed.\n"); /* read bass failed */
3031 
3032  return 1; /* return error */
3033  }
3034  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3035  prev &= ~(0xF << 12); /* clear the settings */
3036  prev |= db << 12; /* set the config */
3037  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
3038  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
3039  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_BASS, buf, 2); /* write the bass */
3040  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3041  {
3042  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write bass failed.\n"); /* write bass failed */
3043 
3044  return 1; /* return error */
3045  }
3046 
3047  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3048 }
3049

3066

3068  {
3069  return 2; /* return error */
3070  }

3072  {
3073  return 3; /* return error */
3074  }
3075  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3076  {
3077  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3078 
3079  return 1; /* return error */
3080  }
3081

3085  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read bass failed.\n"); /* read bass failed */
3086 
3087  return 1; /* return error */
3088  }
3089  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3090  *db = ((prev >> 12) & 0x0F); /* get the control */
3091 
3092  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3093 }

3161 uint8_t vs1053b_set_lower_limit_frequency_in_1000_hz(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t step)
3162 {
3163  uint8_t res;
3164  uint8_t buf[2];
3165  uint16_t prev;
3166 
3167  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3168  {
3169  return 2; /* return error */
3170  }
3171  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3172  {
3173  return 3; /* return error */
3174  }
3175  if (step > 15) /* check step */
3176  {
3177  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: step > 15.\n"); /* step > 15 */
3178 
3179  return 4; /* return error */
3180  }
3181  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3182  {
3183  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3184 
3185  return 1; /* return error */
3186  }
3187 
3188  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_BASS, buf, 2); /* read the bass */
3189  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3190  {
3191  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read bass failed.\n"); /* read bass failed */
3192 
3193  return 1; /* return error */
3194  }
3195  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3196  prev &= ~(0xF << 8); /* clear the settings */
3197  prev |= step << 8; /* set the config */
3198  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
3199  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
3200  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_BASS, buf, 2); /* write the bass */
3201  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3202  {
3203  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write bass failed.\n"); /* write bass failed */
3204 
3205  return 1; /* return error */
3206  }
3207 
3208  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3209 }

3323 {

3325  uint8_t buf[2];
3326  uint16_t prev;
3327 
3328  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3329  {
3330  return 2; /* return error */
3331  }
3332  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3333  {
3334  return 3; /* return error */
3335  }
3336  if (db > 15) /* check db */
3337  {
3338  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: db > 15.\n"); /* db > 15 */
3339 
3340  return 4; /* return error */
3341  }
3342  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3343  {
3344  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3345 
3346  return 1; /* return error */
3347  }
3348 
3349  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_BASS, buf, 2); /* read the bass */
3350  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3351  {
3352  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read bass failed.\n"); /* read bass failed */
3353 
3354  return 1; /* return error */
3355  }
3356  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3357  prev &= ~(0xF << 4); /* clear the settings */
3358  prev |= db << 4; /* set the config */
3359  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
3360  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
3361  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_BASS, buf, 2); /* write the bass */
3362  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3363  {
3364  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write bass failed.\n"); /* write bass failed */

3366  return 1; /* return error */
3367  }
3368 
3369  return 0; /* success return 0 */

3589 uint8_t vs1053b_set_clock_multiplier(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_clock_multiplier_t multiplier)
3590 {
3591  uint8_t res;
3592  uint8_t buf[2];
3593  uint16_t prev;
3594 
3595  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3596  {
3597  return 2; /* return error */
3598  }
3599  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3600  {
3601  return 3; /* return error */
3602  }
3603  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3604  {
3605  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3606 
3607  return 1; /* return error */
3608  }
3609 
3610  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* read the clock */
3611  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3612  {
3613  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read clock failed.\n"); /* read clock failed */
3614 
3615  return 1; /* return error */
3616  }
3617  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3618  prev &= ~(0x7 << 13); /* clear the settings */
3619  prev |= multiplier << 13; /* set the config */
3620  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
3621  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
3622  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* write the clock */
3623  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3624  {
3625  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write clock failed.\n"); /* write clock failed */
3626 
3627  return 1; /* return error */
3628  }
3629 
3630  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3631 }

3645 {
3646  uint8_t res;
3647  uint8_t buf[2];
3648  uint16_t prev;
3649 
3650  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3651  {
3652  return 2; /* return error */
3653  }
3654  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3655  {
3656  return 3; /* return error */
3657  }
3658  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3659  {
3660  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3661 
3662  return 1; /* return error */
3663  }
3664 
3665  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* read the clock */
3666  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3667  {
3668  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read clock failed.\n"); /* read clock failed */
3669 
3670  return 1; /* return error */
3671  }
3672  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3673  *multiplier = (vs1053b_clock_multiplier_t)((prev >> 13) & 0x07); /* get the multiplier */
3674 
3675  return 0; /* success return 0 */

3689 uint8_t vs1053b_set_allowed_multiplier_addition(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_allowed_multiplier_addition_t addition)
3690 {
3691  uint8_t res;
3692  uint8_t buf[2];
3693  uint16_t prev;
3694 
3695  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3696  {
3697  return 2; /* return error */
3698  }
3699  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3700  {
3701  return 3; /* return error */
3702  }
3703  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3704  {
3705  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3706 
3707  return 1; /* return error */
3708  }
3709 
3710  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* read the clock */
3711  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3712  {
3713  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read clock failed.\n"); /* read clock failed */
3714 
3715  return 1; /* return error */
3716  }
3717  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3718  prev &= ~(0x3 << 11); /* clear the settings */
3719  prev |= addition << 11; /* set the config */
3720  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
3721  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
3722  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* write the clock */
3723  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3724  {
3725  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write clock failed.\n"); /* write clock failed */
3726 
3727  return 1; /* return error */
3728  }
3729 
3730  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3731 }

3763  }

3771  }

3774 
3775  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3776 }
3777 
3790 uint8_t vs1053b_set_clock_frequency(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t clk)
3791 {
3792  uint8_t res;
3793  uint8_t buf[2];
3794  uint16_t prev;
3795 
3796  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3797  {
3798  return 2; /* return error */
3799  }
3800  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3801  {
3802  return 3; /* return error */
3803  }
3804  if (clk > 0x3FF) /* check clock */
3805  {
3806  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: clk > 0x3FF.\n"); /* clk > 0x3FF */
3807 
3808  return 4; /* return error */
3809  }
3810  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3811  {
3812  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3813 
3814  return 1; /* return error */
3815  }
3816 
3817  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* read the clock */
3818  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3819  {
3820  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read clock failed.\n"); /* read clock failed */
3821 
3822  return 1; /* return error */
3823  }
3824  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3825  prev &= ~(0x3FF << 0); /* clear the settings */
3826  prev |= clk << 0; /* set the config */
3827  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
3828  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
3829  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* write the clock */
3830  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3831  {
3832  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write clock failed.\n"); /* write clock failed */
3833 
3834  return 1; /* return error */
3835  }
3836 
3837  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3838 }
3839 
3851 uint8_t vs1053b_get_clock_frequency(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *clk)
3852 {
3853  uint8_t res;
3854  uint8_t buf[2];
3855  uint16_t prev;
3856 
3857  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3858  {
3859  return 2; /* return error */
3860  }
3861  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3862  {
3863  return 3; /* return error */
3864  }
3865  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3866  {
3867  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3868 
3869  return 1; /* return error */
3870  }
3871 
3872  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF, buf, 2); /* read the clock */
3873  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3874  {
3875  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read clock failed.\n"); /* read clock failed */
3876 
3877  return 1; /* return error */
3878  }
3879  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
3880  *clk = ((prev >> 0) & 0x3FF); /* get the freq */
3881 
3882  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3883 }
3884 
3896 uint8_t vs1053b_clock_frequency_convert_to_register(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, float hz, uint16_t *reg)
3897 {
3898  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3899  {
3900  return 2; /* return error */
3901  }
3902  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3903  {
3904  return 3; /* return error */
3905  }
3906 
3907  *reg = (uint16_t)((hz - 8000000.0f) / 4000.0f); /* convert real data to register data */
3908 
3909  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3910 }
3911 
3923 uint8_t vs1053b_clock_frequency_convert_to_data(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t reg, float *hz)
3924 {
3925  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3926  {
3927  return 2; /* return error */
3928  }
3929  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3930  {
3931  return 3; /* return error */
3932  }
3933 
3934  *hz = (float)((float)reg * 4000.0f + 8000000.0f); /* convert raw data to real data */
3935 
3936  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3937 }
3938 
3950 uint8_t vs1053b_set_decode_time(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t decode_time)
3951 {
3952  uint8_t res;
3953  uint8_t buf[2];
3954 
3955  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
3956  {
3957  return 2; /* return error */
3958  }
3959  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
3960  {
3961  return 3; /* return error */
3962  }
3963  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3964  {
3965  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3966 
3967  return 1; /* return error */
3968  }
3969 
3970  buf[0] = (decode_time >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
3971  buf[1] = (decode_time >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
3972  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_DECODE_TIME, buf, 2); /* write the decode time */
3973  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3974  {
3975  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write decode time failed.\n"); /* write decode time failed */
3976 
3977  return 1; /* return error */
3978  }
3979  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
3980  {
3981  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
3982 
3983  return 1; /* return error */
3984  }
3985  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_DECODE_TIME, buf, 2); /* write the decode time */
3986  if (res != 0) /* check result */
3987  {
3988  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write decode time failed.\n"); /* write decode time failed */
3989 
3990  return 1; /* return error */
3991  }
3992 
3993  return 0; /* success return 0 */
3994 }
3995 
4007 uint8_t vs1053b_get_decode_time(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *decode_time)
4008 {
4009  uint8_t res;
4010  uint8_t buf[2];
4011 
4012  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4013  {
4014  return 2; /* return error */
4015  }
4016  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4017  {
4018  return 3; /* return error */
4019  }
4020  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4021  {
4022  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4023 
4024  return 1; /* return error */
4025  }
4026 
4027  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_DECODE_TIME, buf, 2); /* read the decode time */
4028  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4029  {
4030  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read decode time failed.\n"); /* read decode time failed */
4031 
4032  return 1; /* return error */
4033  }
4034  *decode_time = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
4035 
4036  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4037 }
4038 
4051 uint8_t vs1053b_set_sample_rate(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t rate, vs1053b_channel_t channel)
4052 {
4053  uint8_t res;
4054  uint8_t buf[2];
4055  uint16_t prev;
4056 
4057  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4058  {
4059  return 2; /* return error */
4060  }
4061  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4062  {
4063  return 3; /* return error */
4064  }
4065  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4066  {
4067  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4068 
4069  return 1; /* return error */
4070  }
4071 
4072  prev = rate | channel; /* set channel */
4073  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4074  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4075  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_AUDATA, buf, 2); /* write the audata */
4076  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4077  {
4078  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write audata failed.\n"); /* write audata failed */
4079 
4080  return 1; /* return error */
4081  }
4082 
4083  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4084 }
4085 
4098 uint8_t vs1053b_get_sample_rate(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *rate, vs1053b_channel_t *channel)
4099 {
4100  uint8_t res;
4101  uint8_t buf[2];
4102  uint16_t prev;
4103 
4104  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4105  {
4106  return 2; /* return error */
4107  }
4108  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4109  {
4110  return 3; /* return error */
4111  }
4112  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4113  {
4114  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4115 
4116  return 1; /* return error */
4117  }
4118 
4119  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AUDATA, buf, 2); /* read the audata */
4120  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4121  {
4122  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read audata failed.\n"); /* read audata failed */
4123 
4124  return 1; /* return error */
4125  }
4126  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
4127  *rate = prev & (~(1 << 0)); /* get the rate */
4128  *channel = (vs1053b_channel_t)(prev & 0x01); /* get the channel */
4129 
4130  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4131 }

4160 
4161  return 1; /* return error */
4162  }

4170  }

4229 {
4230  uint8_t res;
4231  uint8_t buf[2];
4232 
4233  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4234  {
4235  return 2; /* return error */
4236  }
4237  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4238  {
4239  return 3; /* return error */
4240  }

4243  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4244 
4245  return 1; /* return error */
4246  }
4247 
4248  buf[0] = (addr >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4249  buf[1] = (addr >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */

4274 {

4276  uint8_t buf[2];
4277 
4278  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4279  {
4280  return 2; /* return error */
4281  }
4282  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4283  {
4284  return 3; /* return error */
4285  }
4286  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4287  {
4288  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4289 
4290  return 1; /* return error */
4291  }
4292

4294  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4295  {
4296  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
4297 
4298  return 1; /* return error */
4299  }
4300  *dat0 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
4301  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
4302  if (res != 0) /* check result */

4305 
4306  return 1; /* return error */
4307  }

4309 
4310  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4311 }

4426 
4427  return 1; /* return error */
4428  }
4429

4431  buf[1] = (addr >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */

4438  }
