4498 uint8_t vs1053b_set_vol(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t left, uint8_t right)
4499 {
4500  uint8_t res;
4501  uint8_t buf[2];
4502  uint16_t prev;
4503 
4504  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4505  {
4506  return 2; /* return error */
4507  }
4508  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4509  {
4510  return 3; /* return error */
4511  }
4512  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4513  {
4514  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4515 
4516  return 1; /* return error */
4517  }
4518 
4519  prev = (uint16_t)left << 8 | right; /* set vol */
4520  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4521  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4522  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_VOL, buf, 2); /* write vol */
4523  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4524  {
4525  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write vol failed.\n"); /* write vol failed */
4526 
4527  return 1; /* return error */
4528  }
4529 
4530  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4531 }
4532 
4545 uint8_t vs1053b_get_vol(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *left, uint8_t *right)
4546 {
4547  uint8_t res;
4548  uint8_t buf[2];
4549 
4550  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4551  {
4552  return 2; /* return error */
4553  }
4554  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4555  {
4556  return 3; /* return error */
4557  }
4558  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4559  {
4560  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4561 
4562  return 1; /* return error */
4563  }
4564 
4565  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_VOL, buf, 2); /* read the vol */
4566  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4567  {
4568  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read vol failed.\n"); /* read vol failed */
4569 
4570  return 1; /* return error */
4571  }
4572  *left = buf[0]; /* get the left */
4573  *right = buf[1]; /* get the right */
4574 
4575  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4576 }
4577 
4589 uint8_t vs1053b_vol_convert_to_register(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, float db, uint8_t *reg)
4590 {
4591  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4592  {
4593  return 2; /* return error */
4594  }
4595  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4596  {
4597  return 3; /* return error */
4598  }
4599 
4600  *reg = (uint8_t)(fabsf(db) / 0.5f); /* convert real data to register data */
4601 
4602  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4603 }
4604 
4616 uint8_t vs1053b_vol_convert_to_data(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, float *db)
4617 {
4618  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4619  {
4620  return 2; /* return error */
4621  }
4622  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4623  {
4624  return 3; /* return error */
4625  }
4626 
4627  *db = (float)(reg * 0.5f); /* convert raw data to real data */
4628 
4629  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4630 }
4631 
4645 uint8_t vs1053b_write_application(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_application_t num, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
4646 {
4647  uint8_t res;
4648 
4649  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4650  {
4651  return 2; /* return error */
4652  }
4653  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4654  {
4655  return 3; /* return error */
4656  }
4657  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4658  {
4659  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4660 
4661  return 1; /* return error */
4662  }
4663 
4664  if (num == VS1053B_APPLICATION_0) /* app0 */
4665  {
4666  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL0, buf, len); /* write the aictrl0 */
4667  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4668  {
4669  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write aictrl0 failed.\n"); /* write aictrl0 failed */
4670 
4671  return 1; /* return error */
4672  }
4673  }
4674  else if (num == VS1053B_APPLICATION_1) /* app1 */
4675  {
4676  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL1, buf, len); /* write the aictrl1 */
4677  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4678  {
4679  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write aictrl1 failed.\n"); /* write aictrl1 failed */
4680 
4681  return 1; /* return error */
4682  }
4683  }
4684  else if (num == VS1053B_APPLICATION_2) /* app2 */
4685  {
4686  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL2, buf, len); /* write the aictrl2 */
4687  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4688  {
4689  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write aictrl2 failed.\n"); /* write aictrl2 failed */
4690 
4691  return 1; /* return error */
4692  }
4693  }
4694  else /* app3 */
4695  {
4696  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, len); /* write the aictrl3 */
4697  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4698  {
4699  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write aictrl3 failed.\n"); /* write aictrl3 failed */
4700 
4701  return 1; /* return error */
4702  }
4703  }
4704 
4705  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4706 }
4707 
4721 uint8_t vs1053b_read_application(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_application_t num, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
4722 {
4723  uint8_t res;
4724 
4725  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4726  {
4727  return 2; /* return error */
4728  }
4729  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4730  {
4731  return 3; /* return error */
4732  }
4733  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4734  {
4735  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4736 
4737  return 1; /* return error */
4738  }
4739 
4740  if (num == VS1053B_APPLICATION_0) /* app0 */
4741  {
4742  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL0, buf, len); /* read the aictrl0 */
4743  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4744  {
4745  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read aictrl0 failed.\n"); /* read aictrl0 failed */
4746 
4747  return 1; /* return error */
4748  }
4749  }
4750  else if (num == VS1053B_APPLICATION_1) /* app1 */
4751  {
4752  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL1, buf, len); /* read the aictrl1 */
4753  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4754  {
4755  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read aictrl1 failed.\n"); /* read aictrl1 failed */
4756 
4757  return 1; /* return error */
4758  }
4759  }
4760  else if (num == VS1053B_APPLICATION_2) /* app2 */
4761  {
4762  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL2, buf, len); /* read the aictrl2 */
4763  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4764  {
4765  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write aictrl2 failed.\n"); /* read aictrl2 failed */
4766 
4767  return 1; /* return error */
4768  }
4769  }
4770  else /* app3 */
4771  {
4772  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, len); /* read the aictrl3 */
4773  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4774  {
4775  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write aictrl3 failed.\n"); /* read aictrl3 failed */
4776 
4777  return 1; /* return error */
4778  }
4779  }
4780 
4781  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4782 }
4783 
4795 uint8_t vs1053b_set_play_speed(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_play_speed_t speed)
4796 {
4797  uint8_t res;
4798  uint8_t buf[2];
4799  uint16_t prev;
4800 
4801  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4802  {
4803  return 2; /* return error */
4804  }
4805  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4806  {
4807  return 3; /* return error */
4808  }
4809 
4810  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4811  {
4812  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4813 
4814  return 1; /* return error */
4815  }
4816  prev = 0x1E04; /* set addr */
4817  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4818  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4819  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
4820  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4821  {
4822  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
4823 
4824  return 1; /* return error */
4825  }
4826 
4827  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4828  {
4829  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4830 
4831  return 1; /* return error */
4832  }
4833  prev = speed; /* set play speed */
4834  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4835  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4836  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* write the ram */
4837  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4838  {
4839  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram failed.\n"); /* write ram failed */
4840 
4841  return 1; /* return error */
4842  }
4843 
4844  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4845 }
4846 
4858 uint8_t vs1053b_get_play_speed(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_play_speed_t *speed)
4859 {
4860  uint8_t res;
4861  uint8_t buf[2];
4862  uint16_t prev;
4863 
4864  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4865  {
4866  return 2; /* return error */
4867  }
4868  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4869  {
4870  return 3; /* return error */
4871  }
4872 
4873  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4874  {
4875  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4876 
4877  return 1; /* return error */
4878  }
4879  prev = 0x1E04; /* set addr */
4880  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4881  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4882  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
4883  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4884  {
4885  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
4886 
4887  return 1; /* return error */
4888  }
4889 
4890  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4891  {
4892  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4893 
4894  return 1; /* return error */
4895  }
4896  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
4897  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4898  {
4899  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
4900 
4901  return 1; /* return error */
4902  }
4903  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
4904  *speed = (vs1053b_play_speed_t)(prev & 0x03); /* get speed */
4905 
4906  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4907 }
4908 
4920 uint8_t vs1053b_get_byte_rate(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *rate)
4921 {
4922  uint8_t res;
4923  uint8_t buf[2];
4924  uint16_t prev;
4925 
4926  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4927  {
4928  return 2; /* return error */
4929  }
4930  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4931  {
4932  return 3; /* return error */
4933  }
4934 
4935  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4936  {
4937  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4938 
4939  return 1; /* return error */
4940  }
4941  prev = 0x1E05; /* set addr */
4942  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4943  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4944  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
4945  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4946  {
4947  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
4948 
4949  return 1; /* return error */
4950  }
4951 
4952  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4953  {
4954  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4955 
4956  return 1; /* return error */
4957  }
4958  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
4959  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4960  {
4961  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
4962 
4963  return 1; /* return error */
4964  }
4965  *rate = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
4966 
4967  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4968 }
4969 
4981 uint8_t vs1053b_get_end_fill_byte(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t *byte)
4982 {
4983  uint8_t res;
4984  uint8_t buf[2];
4985  uint16_t prev;
4986 
4987  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4988  {
4989  return 2; /* return error */
4990  }
4991  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4992  {
4993  return 3; /* return error */
4994  }
4995 
4996  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4997  {
4998  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4999 
5000  return 1; /* return error */
5001  }
5002  prev = 0x1E06; /* set addr */
5003  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5004  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5005  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5006  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5007  {
5008  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5009 
5010  return 1; /* return error */
5011  }
5012 
5013  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5014  {
5015  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5016 
5017  return 1; /* return error */
5018  }
5019  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5020  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5021  {
5022  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5023 
5024  return 1; /* return error */
5025  }
5026  *byte = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5027 
5028  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5029 }
5030 
5042 uint8_t vs1053b_set_iis_mclk(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
5043 {
5044  uint8_t res;
5045  uint8_t buf[2];
5046  uint16_t prev;
5047  uint16_t prev2;
5048 
5049  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5050  {
5051  return 2; /* return error */
5052  }
5053  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5054  {
5055  return 3; /* return error */
5056  }
5057 
5058  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5059  {
5060  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5061 
5062  return 1; /* return error */
5063  }
5064  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5065  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5066  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5067  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5068  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5069  {
5070  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5071 
5072  return 1; /* return error */
5073  }
5074 
5075  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5076  {
5077  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5078 
5079  return 1; /* return error */
5080  }
5081  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5082  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5083  {
5084  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5085 
5086  return 1; /* return error */
5087  }
5088  prev2 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5089 
5090  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5091  {
5092  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5093 
5094  return 1; /* return error */
5095  }
5096  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5097  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5098  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5099  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5100  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5101  {
5102  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5103 
5104  return 1; /* return error */
5105  }
5106 
5107  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5108  {
5109  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5110 
5111  return 1; /* return error */
5112  }
5113  prev2 &= ~(1 << 3); /* clear settings */
5114  prev2 |= enable << 3; /* set bool */
5115  buf[0] = (prev2 >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5116  buf[1] = (prev2 >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5117  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* write the ram */
5118  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5119  {
5120  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram failed.\n"); /* write ram failed */
5121 
5122  return 1; /* return error */
5123  }
5124 
5125  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5126 }
5127 
5139 uint8_t vs1053b_get_iis_mclk(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t *enable)
5140 {
5141  uint8_t res;
5142  uint8_t buf[2];
5143  uint16_t prev;
5144 
5145  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5146  {
5147  return 2; /* return error */
5148  }
5149  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5150  {
5151  return 3; /* return error */
5152  }
5153 
5154  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5155  {
5156  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5157 
5158  return 1; /* return error */
5159  }
5160  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5161  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5162  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5163  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5164  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5165  {
5166  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5167 
5168  return 1; /* return error */
5169  }
5170 
5171  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5172  {
5173  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5174 
5175  return 1; /* return error */
5176  }
5177  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5178  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5179  {
5180  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5181 
5182  return 1; /* return error */
5183  }
5184  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5185  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5186  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5187  *enable = (vs1053b_bool_t)((prev >> 3) & 0x01); /* get bool */
5188 
5189  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5190 }
5191 
5203 uint8_t vs1053b_set_iis(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
5204 {
5205  uint8_t res;
5206  uint8_t buf[2];
5207  uint16_t prev;
5208  uint16_t prev2;
5209 
5210  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5211  {
5212  return 2; /* return error */
5213  }
5214  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5215  {
5216  return 3; /* return error */
5217  }
5218 
5219  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5220  {
5221  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5222 
5223  return 1; /* return error */
5224  }
5225  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5226  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5227  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5228  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5229  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5230  {
5231  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5232 
5233  return 1; /* return error */
5234  }
5235 
5236  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5237  {
5238  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5239 
5240  return 1; /* return error */
5241  }
5242  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5243  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5244  {
5245  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5246 
5247  return 1; /* return error */
5248  }
5249  prev2 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5250 
5251  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5252  {
5253  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5254 
5255  return 1; /* return error */
5256  }
5257  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5258  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5259  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5260  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5261  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5262  {
5263  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5264 
5265  return 1; /* return error */
5266  }
5267 
5268  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5269  {
5270  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5271 
5272  return 1; /* return error */
5273  }
5274  prev2 &= ~(1 << 2); /* clear settings */
5275  prev2 |= enable << 2; /* set bool */
5276  buf[0] = (prev2 >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5277  buf[1] = (prev2 >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5278  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* write the ram */
5279  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5280  {
5281  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram failed.\n"); /* write ram failed */
5282 
5283  return 1; /* return error */
5284  }
5285 
5286  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5287 }
5288 
5300 uint8_t vs1053b_get_iis(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_bool_t *enable)
5301 {
5302  uint8_t res;
5303  uint8_t buf[2];
5304  uint16_t prev;
5305 
5306  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5307  {
5308  return 2; /* return error */
5309  }
5310  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5311  {
5312  return 3; /* return error */
5313  }
5314 
5315  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5316  {
5317  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5318 
5319  return 1; /* return error */
5320  }
5321  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5322  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5323  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5324  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5325  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5326  {
5327  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5328 
5329  return 1; /* return error */
5330  }
5331 
5332  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5333  {
5334  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5335 
5336  return 1; /* return error */
5337  }
5338  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5339  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5340  {
5341  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5342 
5343  return 1; /* return error */
5344  }
5345  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5346  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5347  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5348  *enable = (vs1053b_bool_t)((prev >> 2) & 0x01); /* get bool */
5349 
5350  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5351 }
5352 
5364 uint8_t vs1053b_set_iis_rate(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_iis_rate_t iis_rate)
5365 {
5366  uint8_t res;
5367  uint8_t buf[2];
5368  uint16_t prev;
5369  uint16_t prev2;
5370 
5371  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5372  {
5373  return 2; /* return error */
5374  }
5375  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5376  {
5377  return 3; /* return error */
5378  }
5379 
5380  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5381  {
5382  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5383 
5384  return 1; /* return error */
5385  }
5386  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5387  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5388  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5389  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5390  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5391  {
5392  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5393 
5394  return 1; /* return error */
5395  }
5396 
5397  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5398  {
5399  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5400 
5401  return 1; /* return error */
5402  }
5403  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5404  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5405  {
5406  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5407 
5408  return 1; /* return error */
5409  }
5410  prev2 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5411 
5412  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5413  {
5414  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5415 
5416  return 1; /* return error */
5417  }
5418  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5419  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5420  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5421  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5422  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5423  {
5424  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5425 
5426  return 1; /* return error */
5427  }
5428 
5429  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5430  {
5431  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5432 
5433  return 1; /* return error */
5434  }
5435  prev2 &= ~(3 << 0); /* clear settings */
5436  prev2 |= iis_rate << 0; /* set iis rate */
5437  buf[0] = (prev2 >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5438  buf[1] = (prev2 >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5439  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* write the ram */
5440  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5441  {
5442  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram failed.\n"); /* write ram failed */
5443 
5444  return 1; /* return error */
5445  }
5446 
5447  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5448 }
5449 
5461 uint8_t vs1053b_get_iis_rate(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_iis_rate_t *iis_rate)
5462 {
5463  uint8_t res;
5464  uint8_t buf[2];
5465  uint16_t prev;
5466 
5467  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5468  {
5469  return 2; /* return error */
5470  }
5471  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5472  {
5473  return 3; /* return error */
5474  }
5475 
5476  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5477  {
5478  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5479 
5480  return 1; /* return error */
5481  }
5482  prev = 0xC040; /* set addr */
5483  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5484  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5485  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5486  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5487  {
5488  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5489 
5490  return 1; /* return error */
5491  }
5492 
5493  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5494  {
5495  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5496 
5497  return 1; /* return error */
5498  }
5499  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5500  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5501  {
5502  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5503 
5504  return 1; /* return error */
5505  }
5506  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5507  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5508  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5509  *iis_rate= (vs1053b_iis_rate_t)((prev >> 0) & 0x03); /* get iis rate */
5510 
5511  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5512 }
5513 
5525 uint8_t vs1053b_set_gpio_direction(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t mask)
5526 {
5527  uint8_t res;
5528  uint8_t buf[2];
5529  uint16_t prev;
5530  uint16_t prev2;
5531 
5532  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5533  {
5534  return 2; /* return error */
5535  }
5536  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5537  {
5538  return 3; /* return error */
5539  }
5540 
5541  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5542  {
5543  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5544 
5545  return 1; /* return error */
5546  }
5547  prev = 0xC017; /* set addr */
5548  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5549  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5550  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5551  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5552  {
5553  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5554 
5555  return 1; /* return error */
5556  }
5557 
5558  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5559  {
5560  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5561 
5562  return 1; /* return error */
5563  }
5564  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5565  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5566  {
5567  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5568 
5569  return 1; /* return error */
5570  }
5571  prev2 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5572 
5573  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5574  {
5575  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5576 
5577  return 1; /* return error */
5578  }
5579  prev = 0xC017; /* set addr */
5580  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5581  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5582  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5583  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5584  {
5585  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5586 
5587  return 1; /* return error */
5588  }
5589 
5590  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5591  {
5592  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5593 
5594  return 1; /* return error */
5595  }
5596  prev2 &= ~(0x3FF); /* clear settings */
5597  prev2 |= mask; /* set mask */
5598  buf[0] = (prev2 >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5599  buf[1] = (prev2 >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5600  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* write the ram */
5601  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5602  {
5603  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram failed.\n"); /* write ram failed */
5604 
5605  return 1; /* return error */
5606  }
5607 
5608  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5609 }

5696  }

5699  {

5702  return 1; /* return error */
5703  }

5705  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5706  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */

5745 {

5748  uint16_t prev;
5749  uint16_t prev2;
5750 
5751  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5752  {
5753  return 2; /* return error */
5754  }
5755  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5756  {
5757  return 3; /* return error */
5758  }
5759 
5760  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5761  {
5762  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5763 
5764  return 1; /* return error */
5765  }
5766  prev = 0xC019; /* set addr */
5767  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5768  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5769  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5770  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5771  {
5772  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5773 
5774  return 1; /* return error */
5775  }
5776 
5777  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5778  {
5779  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5780 
5781  return 1; /* return error */
5782  }
5783  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
5784  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5785  {
5786  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
5787 
5788  return 1; /* return error */
5789  }
5790  prev2 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
5791 
5792  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5793  {
5794  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5795 
5796  return 1; /* return error */
5797  }
5798  prev = 0xC019; /* set addr */
5799  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5800  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5801  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
5802  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5803  {
5804  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
5805 
5806  return 1; /* return error */
5807  }
5808 
5809  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5810  {
5811  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5812 
5813  return 1; /* return error */
5814  }
5815  prev2 &= ~(0x1FF); /* clear settings */
5816  prev2 |= data; /* set data */
5817  buf[0] = (prev2 >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5818  buf[1] = (prev2 >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5819  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* write the ram */
5820  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5821  {
5822  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram failed.\n"); /* write ram failed */
5823 
5824  return 1; /* return error */
5825  }
5826 
5827  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5828 }

5942 
5955 uint8_t vs1053b_init(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
5956 {
5957  uint8_t res;
5958  uint8_t buf[2];
5959  uint16_t prev;
5960  uint16_t timeout;
5961 
5962  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5963  {
5964  return 2; /* return error */
5965  }
5966  if (handle->debug_print == NULL) /* check debug_print */
5967  {
5968  return 3; /* return error */
5969  }
5970  if (handle->spi_cmd_init == NULL) /* check spi_cmd_init */
5971  {
5972  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi_cmd_init is null.\n"); /* spi_cmd_init is null */
5973 
5974  return 3; /* return error */
5975  }
5976  if (handle->spi_cmd_deinit == NULL) /* check spi_cmd_deinit */
5977  {
5978  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi_cmd_deinit is null.\n"); /* spi_cmd_deinit is null */
5979 
5980  return 3; /* return error */
5981  }
5982  if (handle->spi_cmd_write_address16 == NULL) /* check spi_cmd_write_address16 */
5983  {
5984  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi_cmd_write_address16 is null.\n"); /* spi_cmd_write_address16 is null */
5985 
5986  return 3; /* return error */
5987  }
5988  if (handle->spi_cmd_read_address16 == NULL) /* check spi_cmd_read_address16 */
5989  {
5990  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi_cmd_read_address16 is null.\n"); /* spi_cmd_read_address16 is null */
5991 
5992  return 3; /* return error */
5993  }
5994  if (handle->spi_dat_init == NULL) /* check spi_dat_init */
5995  {
5996  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi_dat_init is null.\n"); /* spi_dat_init is null */
5997 
5998  return 3; /* return error */
5999  }
6000  if (handle->spi_dat_deinit == NULL) /* check spi_dat_deinit */
6001  {
6002  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi_dat_deinit is null.\n"); /* spi_dat_deinit is null */
6003 
6004  return 3; /* return error */
6005  }
6006  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd == NULL) /* check spi_dat_write_cmd */
6007  {
6008  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi_dat_write_cmd is null.\n"); /* spi_dat_write_cmd is null */
6009 
6010  return 3; /* return error */
6011  }
6012  if (handle->reset_gpio_init == NULL) /* check reset_gpio_init */
6013  {
6014  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset_gpio_init is null.\n"); /* reset_gpio_init is null */
6015 
6016  return 3; /* return error */
6017  }
6018  if (handle->reset_gpio_deinit == NULL) /* check reset_gpio_deinit */
6019  {
6020  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset_gpio_deinit is null.\n"); /* reset_gpio_deinit is null */
6021 
6022  return 3; /* return error */
6023  }
6024  if (handle->reset_gpio_write == NULL) /* check reset_gpio_write */
6025  {
6026  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset_gpio_write is null.\n"); /* reset_gpio_write is null */
6027 
6028  return 3; /* return error */
6029  }
6030  if (handle->dreq_gpio_init == NULL) /* check dreq_gpio_init */
6031  {
6032  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: dreq_gpio_init is null.\n"); /* dreq_gpio_init is null */
6033 
6034  return 3; /* return error */
6035  }
6036  if (handle->dreq_gpio_deinit == NULL) /* check dreq_gpio_deinit */
6037  {
6038  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: dreq_gpio_deinit is null.\n"); /* dreq_gpio_deinit is null */
6039 
6040  return 3; /* return error */
6041  }
6042  if (handle->dreq_gpio_read == NULL) /* check dreq_gpio_read */
6043  {
6044  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: dreq_gpio_read is null.\n"); /* dreq_gpio_read is null */
6045 
6046  return 3; /* return error */
6047  }
6048  if (handle->audio_init == NULL) /* check audio_init */
6049  {
6050  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio_init is null.\n"); /* audio_init is null */
6051 
6052  return 3; /* return error */
6053  }
6054  if (handle->audio_deinit == NULL) /* check audio_deinit */
6055  {
6056  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio_deinit is null.\n"); /* audio_deinit is null */
6057 
6058  return 3; /* return error */
6059  }
6060  if (handle->audio_read == NULL) /* check audio_read */
6061  {
6062  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio_read is null.\n"); /* audio_read is null */
6063 
6064  return 3; /* return error */
6065  }
6066  if (handle->audio_write == NULL) /* check audio_write */
6067  {
6068  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio_write is null.\n"); /* audio_write is null */
6069 
6070  return 3; /* return error */
6071  }
6072  if (handle->timestamp_read == NULL) /* check timestamp_read */
6073  {
6074  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: timestamp_read is null.\n"); /* timestamp_read is null */
6075 
6076  return 3; /* return error */
6077  }
6078  if (handle->delay_ms == NULL) /* check delay_ms */
6079  {
6080  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: delay_ms is null.\n"); /* delay_ms is null */
6081 
6082  return 3; /* return error */
6083  }
6084  if (handle->receive_callback == NULL) /* check receive_callback */
6085  {
6086  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: receive_callback is null.\n"); /* receive_callback is null */
6087 
6088  return 3; /* return error */
6089  }
6090 
6091  if (handle->reset_gpio_init() != 0) /* reset gpio init */
6092  {
6093  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio init failed.\n"); /* reset gpio init failed */
6094 
6095  return 4; /* return error */
6096  }
6097  if (handle->dreq_gpio_init() != 0) /* dreq gpio init */
6098  {
6099  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: dreq gpio init failed.\n"); /* dreq gpio init failed */
6100  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6101 
6102  return 4; /* return error */
6103  }
6104  if (handle->spi_cmd_init() != 0) /* spi cmd init */
6105  {
6106  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi cmd init failed.\n"); /* spi cmd init failed */
6107  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6108  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6109 
6110  return 1; /* return error */
6111  }
6112  if (handle->spi_dat_init() != 0) /* spi dat init failed */
6113  {
6114  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi dat init failed.\n"); /* spi dat init failed */
6115  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6116  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6117  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6118 
6119  return 1; /* return error */
6120  }
6121 
6122  res = handle->reset_gpio_write(0); /* set low */
6123  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6124  {
6125  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio write failed.\n"); /* reset gpio write failed */
6126  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6127  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6128  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6129  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6130 
6131  return 5; /* return error */
6132  }
6133  handle->delay_ms(20); /* delay 20ms */
6134  res = handle->reset_gpio_write(1); /* set high */
6135  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6136  {
6137  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio write failed.\n"); /* reset gpio write failed */
6138  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6139  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6140  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6141  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6142 
6143  return 5; /* return error */
6144  }
6145 
6146  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6147  {
6148  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6149  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6150  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6151  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6152  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6153 
6154  return 5; /* return error */
6155  }
6156  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
6157  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6158  {
6159  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
6160  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6161  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6162  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6163  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6164 
6165  return 5; /* return error */
6166  }
6167  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6168  prev &= ~(1 << 2); /* clear the settings */
6169  prev |= 1 << 2; /* set the config */
6170  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
6171  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
6172  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
6173  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6174  {
6175  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
6176  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6177  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6178  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6179  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6180 
6181  return 5; /* return error */
6182  }
6183 
6184  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6185  {
6186  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6187  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6188  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6189  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6190  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6191 
6192  return 5; /* return error */
6193  }
6194  timeout = 1000; /* timeout 1000ms */
6195  while (timeout != 0) /* check timeout */
6196  {
6197  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
6198  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6199  {
6200  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
6201  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6202  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6203  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6204  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6205 
6206  return 5; /* return error */
6207  }
6208  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6209  if (((prev >> 2) & 0x01) == 0) /* check flag */
6210  {
6211  break; /* break */
6212  }
6213  timeout--; /* timeout */
6214  handle->delay_ms(1); /* delay 1ms */
6215  }
6216  if (timeout == 0) /* check timeout */
6217  {
6218  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset failed.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6219  (void)handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6220  (void)handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6221  (void)handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6222  (void)handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6223 
6224  return 5; /* return error */
6225  }
6226  handle->period = 0; /* init 0 */
6227  handle->period_enable = 0; /* init 0 */
6228  handle->timestamp = 0; /* init 0 */
6229  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_STOP; /* no working */
6230  handle->pause = 0; /* no pause */
6231  handle->cur_pos = 0; /* current position */
6232  handle->buf_pos = 0; /* buffer position */
6233  handle->size = 0; /* total size */
6234  handle->record_type = 0; /* init record type */
6235  handle->plugin_patch_type = 0; /* plugin patch type */
6236  handle->inited = 1; /* flag finish initialization */
6237 
6238  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6239 }
6240 
6252 uint8_t vs1053b_deinit(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
6253 {
6254  uint8_t res;
6255 
6256  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6257  {
6258  return 2; /* return error */
6259  }
6260  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6261  {
6262  return 3; /* return error */
6263  }
6264 
6265  res = handle->reset_gpio_write(0); /* set low */
6266  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6267  {
6268  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio write failed.\n"); /* reset gpio write failed */
6269 
6270  return 4; /* return error */
6271  }
6272  handle->delay_ms(20); /* delay 20ms */
6273  res = handle->reset_gpio_write(1); /* set high */
6274  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6275  {
6276  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio write failed.\n"); /* reset gpio write failed */
6277 
6278  return 4; /* return error */
6279  }
6280 
6281  res = handle->spi_cmd_deinit(); /* spi cmd deinit */
6282  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6283  {
6284  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi cmd deinit failed.\n"); /* spi cmd deinit failed */
6285 
6286  return 1; /* return error */
6287  }
6288  res = handle->spi_dat_deinit(); /* spi dat deinit */
6289  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6290  {
6291  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: spi dat deinit failed.\n"); /* spi dat deinit failed */
6292 
6293  return 1; /* return error */
6294  }
6295  res = handle->dreq_gpio_deinit(); /* dreq gpio deinit */
6296  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6297  {
6298  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: dreq gpio deinit failed.\n"); /* dreq gpio deinit failed */
6299 
6300  return 1; /* return error */
6301  }
6302  res = handle->reset_gpio_deinit(); /* reset gpio deinit */
6303  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6304  {
6305  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio deinit failed.\n"); /* reset gpio deinit failed */
6306 
6307  return 1; /* return error */
6308  }
6309  handle->inited = 0; /* flag close */
6310 
6311  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6312 }
6313 
6326 uint8_t vs1053b_process(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
6327 {
6328  uint8_t res;
6329  uint8_t buf[2];
6330 
6331  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6332  {
6333  return 2; /* return error */
6334  }
6335  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6336  {
6337  return 3; /* return error */
6338  }
6339 
6340  if (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP) /* check status */
6341  {
6342  return 4; /* not working */
6343  }
6344  else if (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_PLAY) /* play */
6345  {
6346  a_period(handle); /* run period callback */
6347  if ((handle->pause != 0) || (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP)) /* if pause and return */
6348  {
6349  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6350  }
6351  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) == 0) /* if not busy */
6352  {
6353  if (handle->cur_pos >= handle->buf_pos) /* check buffer */
6354  {
6355  res = handle->audio_read(handle->cur_pos,
6356  VS1053B_BUFFER_SIZE, handle->buf); /* read buffer */
6357  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6358  {
6359  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio read failed.\n"); /* audio read failed */
6360 
6361  return 1; /* return error */
6362  }
6363  handle->buf_pos += VS1053B_BUFFER_SIZE; /* add pos */
6364  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6365  {
6366  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_READ,
6367  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6368  }
6369  }
6370  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd(handle->buf +
6371  (handle->cur_pos %
6372  VS1053B_BUFFER_SIZE), 32) != 0) /* push data */
6373  {
6374  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: fill buffer failed.\n"); /* fill buffer failed */
6375 
6376  return 1; /* return error */
6377  }
6378  handle->cur_pos += 32; /* current position +32 */
6379  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6380  {
6381  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_WRITE,
6382  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6383  }
6384  if (handle->cur_pos >= handle->size) /* check end */
6385  {
6386  if (a_vs1053b_stop(handle) != 0) /* stop audio */
6387  {
6388  return 1; /* return error */
6389  }
6390  if (handle->audio_deinit() != 0) /* audio deinit */
6391  {
6392  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio deinit failed.\n"); /* audio deinit failed */
6393 
6394  return 1; /* return error */
6395  }
6396  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_STOP; /* set not working */
6397  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6398  {
6399  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_END,
6400  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6401  }
6402  }
6403  }
6404 
6405  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6406  }
6407  else if (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_RECORD) /* record */
6408  {
6409  if (handle->record_type != 0) /* ogg */
6410  {
6411  uint8_t b[2];
6412  uint16_t i;
6413  uint16_t j;
6414  uint16_t l;
6415  uint16_t dat1;
6416 
6417  a_period(handle); /* run period callback */
6418  if ((handle->pause != 0) || (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP)) /* if pause and return */
6419  {
6420  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6421  }
6422 
6423  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6424  {
6425  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6426 
6427  return 1; /* return error */
6428  }
6429  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
6430  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6431  {
6432  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6433 
6434  return 1; /* return error */
6435  }
6436  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6437  while (dat1 >= 256) /* check length */
6438  {
6439  l = MIN(dat1, 256); /* get min */
6440  dat1 -= l; /* dat1 - length */
6441  i = 0; /* init 0 */
6442  for (j = 0; j < l; j++) /* loop all */
6443  {
6444  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
6445  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6446  {
6447  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
6448 
6449  return 1; /* return error */
6450  }
6451  handle->buf[i++] = buf[0]; /* save low part */
6452  handle->buf[i++] = buf[1]; /* save high part */
6453  }
6454  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6455  {
6456  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_READ,
6457  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6458  }
6459  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, l * 2, handle->buf); /* write buffer */
6460  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6461  {
6462  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
6463 
6464  return 1; /* return error */
6465  }
6466  handle->cur_pos += l * 2; /* add bytes */
6467  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6468  {
6469  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_WRITE,
6470  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6471  }
6472  if (l < 256) /* check 256 */
6473  {
6474  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, b, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
6475  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6476  {
6477  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
6478 
6479  return 1; /* return error */
6480  }
6481  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, 2); /* read the aictrl3 */
6482  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6483  {
6484  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6485 
6486  return 1; /* return error */
6487  }
6488  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, 2); /* read the aictrl3 */
6489  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6490  {
6491  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6492 
6493  return 1; /* return error */
6494  }
6495  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6496  if (!(dat1 & (1 << 2)))
6497  {
6498  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, 2, b); /* write buffer */
6499  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6500  {
6501  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
6502 
6503  return 1; /* return error */
6504  }
6505  handle->cur_pos += 2; /* add bytes */
6506  }
6507  else
6508  {
6509  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, 1, b); /* write buffer */
6510  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6511  {
6512  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
6513 
6514  return 1; /* return error */
6515  }
6516  handle->cur_pos += 1; /* add bytes */
6517  }
6518  }
6519  }
6520 
6521  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6522  }
6523  else /* wav */
6524  {
6525  uint16_t i;
6526  uint16_t dat1;
6527 
6528  a_period(handle); /* run period callback */
6529  if ((handle->pause != 0) || (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP)) /* if pause and return */
6530  {
6531  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6532  }
6533 
6534  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6535  {
6536  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6537 
6538  return 1; /* return error */
6539  }
6540  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
6541  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6542  {
6543  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6544 
6545  return 1; /* return error */
6546  }
6547  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6548  if ((dat1 >= 256) && (dat1 < 896)) /* check range */
6549  {
6550  i = 0; /* init 0 */
6551  while (i < 512) /* 512 bytes */
6552  {
6553  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
6554  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6555  {
6556  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
6557 
6558  return 1; /* return error */
6559  }
6560  handle->buf[i++] = buf[1]; /* save low part */
6561  handle->buf[i++] = buf[0]; /* save high part */
6562  }
6563  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6564  {
6565  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_READ,
6566  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6567  }
6568  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, 512, handle->buf); /* write buffer */
6569  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6570  {
6571  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
6572 
6573  return 1; /* return error */
6574  }
6575  handle->cur_pos += 512; /* add 512 bytes */
6576  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6577  {
6578  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_WRITE,
6579  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6580  }
6581  }
6582  else if (dat1 >= 896)
6583  {
6584  i = 0; /* init 0 */
6585  while (i < 512) /* 512 bytes */
6586  {
6587  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
6588  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6589  {
6590  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
6591 
6592  return 1; /* return error */
6593  }
6594  handle->buf[i++] = buf[1]; /* save low part */
6595  handle->buf[i++] = buf[0]; /* save high part */
6596  }
6597  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6598  {
6599  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_READ,
6600  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6601  }
6602  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6603  {
6604  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_OVER,
6605  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6606  }
6607  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: buffer is over.\n"); /* buffer is over */
6608  }
6609  else
6610  {
6611  /* do nothing */
6612  }
6613 
6614  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6615  }
6616  }
6617  else
6618  {
6619  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: status is invalid.\n"); /* status is invalid */
6620 
6621  return 5; /* return error */
6622  }
6623 }
6624 
6635 uint8_t vs1053b_pause(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
6636 {
6637  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6638  {
6639  return 2; /* return error */
6640  }
6641  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6642  {
6643  return 3; /* return error */
6644  }
6645  if (handle->status != 0) /* check played */
6646  {
6647  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio working.\n"); /* audio working */
6648 
6649  return 4; /* return error */
6650  }
6651 
6652  handle->pause = 1; /* flag paused */
6653 
6654  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6655 }
6656 
6669 uint8_t vs1053b_play(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, char *path)
6670 {
6671  uint8_t res;
6672  uint32_t sec;
6673  uint32_t us;
6674 
6675  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6676  {
6677  return 2; /* return error */
6678  }
6679  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6680  {
6681  return 3; /* return error */
6682  }
6683  if (handle->status != 0) /* check played */
6684  {
6685  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio working.\n"); /* audio working */
6686 
6687  return 4; /* return error */
6688  }
6689 
6690  if (handle->pause != 0) /* if pause and return */
6691  {
6692  handle->pause = 0; /* recover */
6693 
6694  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6695  }
6696 
6697  res = a_vs1053b_stop(handle); /* stop playing */
6698  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6699  {
6700  return 1; /* return error */
6701  }
6702  res = handle->audio_init(0, path, &handle->size); /* audio init */
6703  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6704  {
6705  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio init failed.\n"); /* audio init failed */
6706 
6707  return 1; /* return error */
6708  }
6709  handle->timestamp_read(&sec, &us); /* read timestamp */
6710  handle->timestamp = (((uint64_t)sec) * 1000000 + ((uint64_t)us)); /* set timestamp */
6711  handle->cur_pos = 0; /* current position */
6712  handle->buf_pos = 0; /* buffer position */
6713  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_PLAY; /* active play */
6714 
6715  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6716 }
6717 
6732 uint8_t vs1053b_record(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, char *path, uint32_t sample_rate)
6733 {
6734  uint8_t res;
6735  uint8_t buf[2];
6736  uint32_t sec;
6737  uint32_t us;
6738 
6739  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6740  {
6741  return 2; /* return error */
6742  }
6743  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6744  {
6745  return 3; /* return error */
6746  }
6747  if (handle->status != 0) /* check played */
6748  {
6749  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio working.\n"); /* audio working */
6750 
6751  return 4; /* return error */
6752  }
6753 
6754  if (handle->pause != 0) /* if pause and return */
6755  {
6756  handle->pause = 0; /* recover */
6757 
6758  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6759  }
6760 
6761  res = handle->audio_init(1, path, &handle->size); /* audio init */
6762  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6763  {
6764  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio init failed.\n"); /* audio init failed */
6765 
6766  return 1; /* return error */
6767  }
6768  if (handle->record_type != 0) /* ogg */
6769  {
6770  if ((handle->plugin_patch_type >= 0x02) &&
6771  (handle->plugin_patch_type <= 0x0C)) /* 8000hz */
6772  {
6773  if (sample_rate != 8000) /* check sample rate */
6774  {
6775  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: sample rate "
6776  "doesn't match path.\n"); /* sample rate doesn't match patch */
6777 
6778  return 5; /* return error */
6779  }
6780  }
6781  else if ((handle->plugin_patch_type >= 0x0D) &&
6782  (handle->plugin_patch_type <= 0x22)) /* 16000hz */
6783  {
6784  if (sample_rate != 16000) /* check sample rate */
6785  {
6786  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: sample rate "
6787  "doesn't match path.\n"); /* sample rate doesn't match patch */
6788 
6789  return 5; /* return error */
6790  }
6791  }
6792  else if ((handle->plugin_patch_type >= 0x23) &&
6793  (handle->plugin_patch_type <= 0x2E)) /* 44100hz */
6794  {
6795  if (sample_rate != 44100) /* check sample rate */
6796  {
6797  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: sample rate "
6798  "doesn't match path.\n"); /* sample rate doesn't match patch */
6799 
6800  return 5; /* return error */
6801  }
6802  }
6803  else
6804  {
6805  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: sample rate "
6806  "doesn't match path.\n"); /* sample rate doesn't match patch */
6807 
6808  return 5; /* return error */
6809  }
6810 
6811  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6812  {
6813  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6814 
6815  return 1; /* return error */
6816  }
6817  buf[0] = 0x00; /* set msb */
6818  buf[1] = 0x34; /* set lsb */
6819  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_AIADDR, buf, 2); /* write aiaddr */
6820  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6821  {
6822  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write aiaddr failed.\n"); /* write aiaddr failed */
6823 
6824  return 1; /* return error */
6825  }
6826  }
6827  else /* wav */
6828  {
6829  handle->wav.chunk_id[0] = 'R'; /* R */
6830  handle->wav.chunk_id[1] = 'I'; /* I */
6831  handle->wav.chunk_id[2] = 'F'; /* F */
6832  handle->wav.chunk_id[3] = 'F'; /* F */
6833  handle->wav.chunk_size = 0x00000000; /* init 0 */
6834  handle->wav.format[0] = 'W'; /* W */
6835  handle->wav.format[1] = 'A'; /* A */
6836  handle->wav.format[2] = 'V'; /* V */
6837  handle->wav.format[3] = 'E'; /* E */
6838  handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[0] = 'f'; /* f */
6839  handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[1] = 'm'; /* m */
6840  handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[2] = 't'; /* t */
6841  handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[3] = 0x20; /* 0x20 */
6842  handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size = 16; /* 16 bytes */
6843  handle->wav.audio_format = 0x01; /* pcm */
6844  handle->wav.num_channel = 1; /* 1 channel */
6845  handle->wav.sample_rate = sample_rate; /* set sample rate */
6846  handle->wav.byte_rate = handle->wav.sample_rate * 2; /* double */
6847  handle->wav.block_align = 2; /* 2 bytes */
6848  handle->wav.bit_per_sample = 16; /* 16 bits */
6849  handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[0] = 'd'; /* d */
6850  handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[1] = 'a'; /* a */
6851  handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[2] = 't'; /* t */
6852  handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[3] = 'a'; /* a */
6853  handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size = 0x00000000; /* init 0 */
6854  if (a_vs1053b_write_wav_header(handle, &handle->wav) != 0) /* write wav header */
6855  {
6856  return 1; /* return error */
6857  }
6858  }
6859  handle->timestamp_read(&sec, &us); /* read timestamp */
6860  handle->timestamp = (((uint64_t)sec) * 1000000 + ((uint64_t)us)); /* set timestamp */
6861  handle->cur_pos = 44; /* current position */
6862  handle->buf_pos = 0; /* buffer position */
6863  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_RECORD; /* active record */
6864 
6865  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6866 }
6867 
6880 uint8_t vs1053b_stop(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
6881 {
6882  uint8_t res;
6883  uint8_t buf[2];
6884  uint16_t prev;
6885 
6886  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6887  {
6888  return 2; /* return error */
6889  }
6890  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6891  {
6892  return 3; /* return error */
6893  }
6894  if (handle->status == 0) /* check played */
6895  {
6896  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio not working.\n"); /* audio not working */
6897 
6898  return 4; /* return error */
6899  }
6900 
6901  if (handle->status == 1) /* play */
6902  {
6903  if (a_vs1053b_stop(handle) != 0) /* stop audio */
6904  {
6905  return 1; /* return error */
6906  }
6907  if (handle->audio_deinit() != 0) /* audio deinit */
6908  {
6909  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio deinit failed.\n"); /* audio deinit failed */
6910 
6911  return 1; /* return error */
6912  }
6913  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_STOP; /* set not working */
6914  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
6915  {
6916  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_END,
6917  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
6918  }
6919 
6920  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6921  }
6922  else if (handle->status == 2) /* record */
6923  {
6924  if ((handle->pause != 0) || (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP)) /* if pause and return */
6925  {
6926  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6927  }
6928 
6929  if (handle->record_type != 0) /* ogg */
6930  {
6931  uint8_t b[2];
6932  uint16_t i;
6933  uint16_t j;
6934  uint16_t l;
6935  uint16_t ll;
6936  uint16_t dat1;
6937 
6938  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6939  {
6940  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6941 
6942  return 1; /* return error */
6943  }
6944  buf[0] = 0x00; /* 0x00 */
6945  buf[1] = 0x01; /* 0x01 */
6946  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, 2); /* read the aictrl3 */
6947  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6948  {
6949  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6950 
6951  return 1; /* return error */
6952  }
6953 
6954  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6955  {
6956  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6957 
6958  return 1; /* return error */
6959  }
6960  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
6961  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6962  {
6963  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6964 
6965  return 1; /* return error */
6966  }
6967  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6968 
6969  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6970  {
6971  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6972 
6973  return 1; /* return error */
6974  }
6975  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, 2); /* read the aictrl3 */
6976  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6977  {
6978  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6979 
6980  return 1; /* return error */
6981  }
6982  ll = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6983  if ((ll & (1 << 1)) != 0) /* check next state*/
6984  {
6985  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
6986  {
6987  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
6988 
6989  return 1; /* return error */
6990  }
6991  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
6992  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6993  {
6994  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
6995 
6996  return 1; /* return error */
6997  }
6998  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
6999  }
7000 
7001  while (dat1 >= 256) /* check length */
7002  {
7003  l = MIN(dat1, 256); /* get min */
7004  dat1 -= l; /* dat1 - length */
7005  if (((ll & (1 << 1)) != 0) && (!dat1)) /* check data */
7006  {
7007  l--; /* length-- */
7008  }
7009  i = 0; /* init 0 */
7010  for (j = 0; j < l; j++) /* loop all */
7011  {
7012  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
7013  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7014  {
7015  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
7016 
7017  return 1; /* return error */
7018  }
7019  handle->buf[i++] = buf[0]; /* save low part */
7020  handle->buf[i++] = buf[1]; /* save high part */
7021  }
7022  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
7023  {
7024  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_READ,
7025  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
7026  }
7027  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, l * 2, handle->buf); /* write buffer */
7028  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7029  {
7030  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
7031 
7032  return 1; /* return error */
7033  }
7034  handle->cur_pos += l * 2; /* add bytes */
7035  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
7036  {
7037  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_WRITE,
7038  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
7039  }
7040  if (l < 256) /* check 256 */
7041  {
7042  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, b, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
7043  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7044  {
7045  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
7046 
7047  return 1; /* return error */
7048  }
7049  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, 2); /* read the aictrl3 */
7050  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7051  {
7052  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
7053 
7054  return 1; /* return error */
7055  }
7056  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_AICTRL3, buf, 2); /* read the aictrl3 */
7057  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7058  {
7059  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
7060 
7061  return 1; /* return error */
7062  }
7063  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
7064  if (!(dat1 & (1 << 2)))
7065  {
7066  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, 2, b); /* write buffer */
7067  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7068  {
7069  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
7070 
7071  return 1; /* return error */
7072  }
7073  handle->cur_pos += 2; /* add bytes */
7074  }
7075  else
7076  {
7077  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, 1, b); /* write buffer */
7078  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7079  {
7080  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
7081 
7082  return 1; /* return error */
7083  }
7084  handle->cur_pos += 1; /* add bytes */
7085  }
7086  }
7087  }
7088  }
7089  else /* wav */
7090  {
7091  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
7092  {
7093  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
7094 
7095  return 1; /* return error */
7096  }
7097 
7098  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
7099  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7100  {
7101  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
7102 
7103  return 1; /* return error */
7104  }
7105  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
7106  prev &= ~(1 << 12); /* clear the settings */
7107  prev |= 0 << 12; /* set the config */
7108  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
7109  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
7110  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
7111  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7112  {
7113  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
7114 
7115  return 1; /* return error */
7116  }
7117  handle->wav.chunk_size = handle->cur_pos - 44 + 36; /* set chunk size */
7118  handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size = handle->cur_pos - 44; /* set sub chunk2 size */
7119  if (a_vs1053b_write_wav_header(handle, &handle->wav) != 0) /* write wav header */
7120  {
7121  return 1; /* return error */
7122  }
7123  }
7124  if (handle->audio_deinit() != 0) /* audio deinit */
7125  {
7126  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio deinit failed.\n"); /* audio deinit failed */
7127 
7128  return 1; /* return error */
7129  }
7130  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_STOP; /* set not working */
7131  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
7132  {
7133  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_END, handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
7134  }
7135 
7136  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7137  }
7138  else
7139  {
7140  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: status is invalid.\n"); /* status is invalid */
7141 
7142  return 5; /* return error */
7143  }
7144 }
7145 
7156 uint8_t vs1053b_hard_reset(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
7157 {
7158  uint8_t res;
7159 
7160  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7161  {
7162  return 2; /* return error */
7163  }
7164  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7165  {
7166  return 3; /* return error */
7167  }
7168 
7169  res = handle->reset_gpio_write(0); /* set low */
7170  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7171  {
7172  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio write failed.\n"); /* reset gpio write failed */
7173 
7174  return 5; /* return error */
7175  }
7176  handle->delay_ms(20); /* delay 20ms */
7177  res = handle->reset_gpio_write(1); /* set high */
7178  if (res != 0) /* check result */
7179  {
7180  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: reset gpio write failed.\n"); /* reset gpio write failed */
7181 
7182  return 5; /* return error */
7183  }
7184  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
7185  {
7186  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
7187 
7188  return 5; /* return error */
7189  }
7190 
7191  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7192 }
7193 
7206 uint8_t vs1053b_set_period_callback(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint32_t second, uint32_t microsecond, vs1053b_bool_t enable)
7207 {
7208  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7209  {
7210  return 2; /* return error */
7211  }
7212  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7213  {
7214  return 3; /* return error */
7215  }
7216 
7217  handle->period = (((uint64_t)second) * 1000000 + ((uint64_t)microsecond)); /* set period */
7218  handle->period_enable = enable; /* set period enable */
7219 
7220  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7221 }
7222 
7235 uint8_t vs1053b_get_period_callback(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint32_t *second, uint32_t *microsecond, vs1053b_bool_t *enable)
7236 {
7237  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7238  {
7239  return 2; /* return error */
7240  }
7241  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7242  {
7243  return 3; /* return error */
7244  }
7245 
7246  *second = (handle->period / 1000000) & 0xFFFFFFFF; /* get second */
7247  *microsecond = (handle->period % 1000000) & 0xFFFFFFFF; /* get microsecond */
7248  *enable = (vs1053b_bool_t)(handle->period_enable); /* get period enable */
7249 
7250  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7251 }
7252 
7265 uint8_t vs1053b_parse_info(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t dat0, uint16_t dat1, vs1053b_audio_info_t *info)
7266 {
7267  const float bitrate[2][16]= {{0.0f, 8.0f, 16.0f, 24.0f, 32.0f, 40.0f, 48.0f, 56.0f, 64.0f,
7268  80.0f, 96.0f, 112.0f, 128.0f, 144.0f, 160.0f, 0.0f},
7269  {0.0f, 32.0f, 40.0f, 48.0f, 56.0f, 64.0f, 80.0f, 96.0f, 112.0f,
7270  128.0f, 160.0f, 192.0f, 224.0f, 256.0f, 320.0f, 0.0f}};
7271 
7272  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7273  {
7274  return 2; /* return error */
7275  }
7276  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7277  {
7278  return 3; /* return error */
7279  }
7280 
7281  switch (dat1)
7282  {
7283  case VS1053B_FORMAT_WAV : /* wav */
7284  {
7285  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_WAV; /* set wav format */
7286  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7287  strncpy(info->format_name, "wav", 32); /* copy name */
7288  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get wav kbps */
7289 
7290  break; /* break */
7291  }
7292  case VS1053B_FORMAT_MIDI : /* midi */
7293  {
7294  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_MIDI; /* set midi format */
7295  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7296  strncpy(info->format_name, "midi", 32); /* copy name */
7297  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get midi kbps */
7298 
7299  break; /* break */
7300  }
7301  case VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADTS : /* acc adts */
7302  {
7303  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADTS; /* set acc adts format */
7304  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7305  strncpy(info->format_name, "aac_adts", 32); /* copy name */
7306  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get acc adts kbps */
7307 
7308  break; /* break */
7309  }
7310  case VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADIF : /* acc adif */
7311  {
7312  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADIF; /* set acc adif format */
7313  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7314  strncpy(info->format_name, "aac_adif", 32); /* copy name */
7315  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get acc adif kbps */
7316 
7317  break; /* break */
7318  }
7319  case VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_MP4 : /* acc mp4 */
7320  {
7321  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_MP4; /* set acc mp4 format */
7322  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7323  strncpy(info->format_name, "aac_mp4", 32); /* copy name */
7324  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get acc mp4 kbps */
7325 
7326  break; /* break */
7327  }
7328  case VS1053B_FORMAT_OGG : /* ogg */
7329  {
7330  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_OGG; /* set ogg format */
7331  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7332  strncpy(info->format_name, "ogg", 32); /* copy name */
7333  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get ogg kbps */
7334 
7335  break; /* break */
7336  }
7337  case VS1053B_FORMAT_WMA : /* wma */
7338  {
7339  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_WMA; /* set wma format */
7340  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7341  strncpy(info->format_name, "wma", 32); /* copy name */
7342  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get wma kbps */
7343 
7344  break; /* break */
7345  }
7346  case VS1053B_FORMAT_FLAC : /* flac */
7347  {
7348  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_FLAC; /* set flac format */
7349  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7350  strncpy(info->format_name, "flac", 32); /* copy name */
7351  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get flac kbps */
7352 
7353  break; /* break */
7354  }
7355  default : /* mp3 */
7356  {
7357  uint16_t tmp;
7358 
7359  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_MP3; /* set mp3 format */
7360  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
7361  strncpy(info->format_name, "mp3", 32); /* copy name */
7362  tmp = (dat1 >> 3) & 0x03; /* get index */
7363  if (tmp == 3) /* index 1 */
7364  {
7365  info->kbps = bitrate[1][(dat0 >> 12) & 0xF]; /* get mp3 kbps */
7366  }
7367  else /* index 0 */
7368  {
7369  info->kbps = bitrate[0][(dat0 >> 12) & 0xF]; /* get mp3 kbps */
7370  }
7371  }
7372 
7373  break; /* break */
7374  }
7375 
7376  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7377 }
7378 
7391 uint8_t vs1053b_get_patch(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_patch_t type, const uint16_t **patch_addr, uint16_t *len)
7392 {
7393  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7394  {
7395  return 2; /* return error */
7396  }
7397  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7398  {
7399  return 3; /* return error */
7400  }
7401 
7402  if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_FLAC) /* flac */
7403  {
7404  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_flac_plugin; /* set flac plugin address */
7405  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_FLAC_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set flac plugin size */
7406  }
7407 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q00 != 0
7408  else if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q00) /* ogg venc08k1q00 */
7409  {
7410  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q00_plugin; /* set plugin address */
7411  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q00_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set plugin size */
7412  }
7413 #endif
7414 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q01 != 0
7415  else if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q01) /* ogg venc08k1q01 */
7416  {
7417  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q01_plugin; /* set plugin address */
7418  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q01_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set plugin size */
7419  }
7420 #endif
7421 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q02 != 0
7422  else if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q02) /* ogg venc08k1q02 */
7423  {
7424  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q02_plugin; /* set plugin address */
7425  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q02_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set plugin size */
7426  }
7427 #endif
7428 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q03 != 0
