7700 #endif
7701 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q03 != 0
7702  else if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q03) /* ogg venc44k2q03 */
7703  {
7704  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q03_plugin; /* set plugin address */
7705  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q03_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set plugin size */
7706  }
7707 #endif
7708 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q04 != 0
7709  else if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q04) /* ogg venc44k2q04 */
7710  {
7711  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q04_plugin; /* set plugin address */
7712  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q04_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set plugin size */
7713  }
7714 #endif
7715 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q05 != 0
7716  else if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q05) /* ogg venc44k2q05 */
7717  {
7718  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q05_plugin; /* set plugin address */
7719  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q05_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set plugin size */
7720  }
7721 #endif
7722  else /* wav */
7723  {
7724  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_wav_plugin; /* set wav plugin address */
7725  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_WAV_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set wav plugin size */
7726  }
7727 
7728  return 0; /* success return 0 */
7729 }
7730 
7744 uint8_t vs1053b_load_patch(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, const uint16_t *patch, uint16_t len)
7745 {
7746  uint8_t res;
7747  uint8_t buf[2];
7748  uint16_t i;
7749  uint16_t addr;
7750  uint16_t n;
7751  uint16_t val;
7752 
7753  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
7754  {
7755  return 2; /* return error */
7756  }
7757  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
7758  {
7759  return 3; /* return error */
7760  }
7761 
7762  if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_flac_plugin) /* flac */
7763  {
7764  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_FLAC; /* save type */
7765  }
7766 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q00 != 0
7767  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q00_plugin) /* venc08k1q00 */
7768  {
7769  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q00; /* save type */
7770  }
7771 #endif
7772 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q01 != 0
7773  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q01_plugin) /* venc08k1q01 */
7774  {
7775  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q01; /* save type */
7776  }
7777 #endif
7778 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q02 != 0
7779  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q02_plugin) /* venc08k1q02 */
7780  {
7781  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q02; /* save type */
7782  }
7783 #endif
7784 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q03 != 0
7785  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q03_plugin) /* venc08k1q03 */
7786  {
7787  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q03; /* save type */
7788  }
7789 #endif
7790 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q04 != 0
7791  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q04_plugin) /* venc08k1q04 */
7792  {
7793  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q04; /* save type */
7794  }
7795 #endif
7796 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q05 != 0
7797  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q05_plugin) /* venc08k1q05 */
7798  {
7799  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q05; /* save type */
7800  }
7801 #endif
7802 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q06 != 0
7803  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q06_plugin) /* venc08k1q06 */
7804  {
7805  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q06; /* save type */
7806  }
7807 #endif
7808 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q07 != 0
7809  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q07_plugin) /* venc08k1q07 */
7810  {
7811  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q07; /* save type */
7812  }
7813 #endif
7814 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q08 != 0
7815  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q08_plugin) /* venc08k1q08 */
7816  {
7817  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q08; /* save type */
7818  }
7819 #endif
7820 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q09 != 0
7821  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q09_plugin) /* venc08k1q09 */
7822  {
7823  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q09; /* save type */
7824  }
7825 #endif
7826 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC08K1Q10 != 0
7827  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc08k1q10_plugin) /* venc08k1q10 */
7828  {
7829  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC08K1Q10; /* save type */
7830  }
7831 #endif
7832 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K1Q00 != 0
7833  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k1q00_plugin) /* venc16k1q00 */

7836  }
7837 #endif
7838 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K1Q01 != 0
7839  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k1q01_plugin) /* venc16k1q01 */
7840  {
7841  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K1Q01; /* save type */
7842  }
7843 #endif

7885 #endif

7888  {
7889  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K1Q09; /* save type */
7890  }
7891 #endif
7892 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K1Q10 != 0
7893  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k1q10_plugin) /* venc16k1q10 */
7894  {
7895  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K1Q10; /* save type */
7896  }
7897 #endif
7898 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q00 != 0
7899  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q00_plugin) /* venc16k2q00 */
7900  {
7901  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q00; /* save type */
7902  }
7903 #endif
7904 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q01 != 0
7905  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q01_plugin) /* venc16k2q01 */
7906  {
7907  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q01; /* save type */
7908  }
7909 #endif
7910 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q02 != 0
7911  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q02_plugin) /* venc16k2q02 */
7912  {
7913  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q02; /* save type */
7914  }
7915 #endif
7916 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q03 != 0
7917  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q03_plugin) /* venc16k2q03 */
7918  {
7919  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q03; /* save type */
7920  }
7921 #endif
7922 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q04 != 0
7923  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q04_plugin) /* venc16k2q04 */
7924  {
7925  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q04; /* save type */
7926  }
7927 #endif
7928 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q05 != 0
7929  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q05_plugin) /* venc16k2q05 */
7930  {
7931  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q05; /* save type */
7932  }
7933 #endif
7934 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q06 != 0
7935  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q06_plugin) /* venc16k2q06 */
7936  {
7937  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q06; /* save type */
7938  }
7939 #endif
7940 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q07 != 0
7941  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q07_plugin) /* venc16k2q07 */
7942  {
7943  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q07; /* save type */
7944  }
7945 #endif
7946 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q08 != 0
7947  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q08_plugin) /* venc16k2q08 */
7948  {
7949  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q08; /* save type */
7950  }
7951 #endif
7952 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q09 != 0
7953  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q09_plugin) /* venc16k2q09 */
7954  {
7955  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q09; /* save type */
7956  }
7957 #endif
7958 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC16K2Q10 != 0
7959  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc16k2q10_plugin) /* venc16k2q10 */
7960  {
7961  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC16K2Q10; /* save type */
7962  }
7963 #endif
7964 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K1Q00 != 0
7965  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k1q00_plugin) /* venc44k1q00 */
7966  {
7967  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K1Q00; /* save type */
7968  }
7969 #endif
7970 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K1Q01 != 0
7971  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k1q01_plugin) /* venc44k1q01 */
7972  {
7973  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K1Q01; /* save type */
7974  }
7975 #endif
7976 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K1Q02 != 0
7977  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k1q02_plugin) /* venc44k1q02 */
7978  {
7979  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K1Q02; /* save type */
7980  }
7981 #endif
7982 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K1Q03 != 0
7983  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k1q03_plugin) /* venc44k1q03 */
7984  {
7985  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K1Q03; /* save type */
7986  }
7987 #endif
7988 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K1Q04 != 0
7989  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k1q04_plugin) /* venc44k1q04 */
7990  {
7991  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K1Q04; /* save type */
7992  }
7993 #endif
7994 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K1Q05 != 0
7995  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k1q05_plugin) /* venc44k1q05 */
7996  {
7997  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K1Q05; /* save type */
7998  }
7999 #endif
8000 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q00 != 0
8001  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q00_plugin) /* venc44k2q00 */
8002  {
8003  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q00; /* save type */
8004  }
8005 #endif
8006 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q01 != 0
8007  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q01_plugin) /* venc44k2q01 */
8008  {
8009  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q01; /* save type */
8010  }
8011 #endif
8012 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q02 != 0
8013  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q02_plugin) /* venc44k2q02 */
8014  {
8015  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q02; /* save type */
8016  }
8017 #endif
8018 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q03 != 0
8019  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q03_plugin) /* venc44k2q03 */
8020  {
8021  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q03; /* save type */
8022  }
8023 #endif
8024 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q04 != 0
8025  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q04_plugin) /* venc44k2q04 */
8026  {
8027  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q04; /* save type */
8028  }
8029 #endif
8030 #if VS1053B_OGG_VENC44K2Q05 != 0
8031  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_ogg_venc44k2q05_plugin) /* venc44k2q05 */
8032  {
8033  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_OGG_VENC44K2Q05; /* save type */
8034  }
8035 #endif
8036  else if (patch == gsc_vs1053b_patch_wav_plugin) /* wav */
8037  {
8038  handle->plugin_patch_type = VS1053B_PATCH_WAV; /* save type */
8039  }
8040  else
8041  {
8042  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: invalid path address.\n"); /* invalid path address */
8043 
8044  return 4; /* return error */
8045  }
8046 
8047  i = 0; /* init 0 */
8048  while (i < len) /* loop */
8049  {
8050  addr = patch[i++]; /* get addr */
8051  n = patch[i++]; /* get n */
8052  if ((n & 0x8000U) != 0) /* rle run, replicate n samples */
8053  {
8054  n &= 0x7FFFU; /* & */
8055  val = patch[i++]; /* get a val */
8056  while (n--) /* loop */
8057  {
8058  buf[0] = (val >> 8) & 0xFF; /* high part */
8059  buf[1] = (val >> 0) & 0xFF; /* low part */
8060  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, (uint8_t)addr, buf, 2); /* write patch */
8061  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8062  {
8063  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: load patch failed.\n"); /* load patch failed */
8064 
8065  return 1; /* return error */
8066  }
8067  }
8068  }
8069  else /* copy run, copy n sample */
8070  {
8071  while (n--) /* loop */
8072  {
8073  val = patch[i++]; /* get a val */
8074  buf[0] = (val >> 8) & 0xFF; /* high part */
8075  buf[1] = (val >> 0) & 0xFF; /* low part */
8076  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, (uint8_t)addr, buf, 2); /* write patch */
8077  if (res != 0) /* check result */
8078  {
8079  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: load patch failed.\n"); /* load patch failed */
8080 
8081  return 1; /* return error */
8082  }
8083  }
8084  }
8085  }
8086 
8087  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8088 }
8089 
8102 uint8_t vs1053b_set_data(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
8103 {
8104  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8105  {
8106  return 2; /* return error */
8107  }
8108  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8109  {
8110  return 3; /* return error */
8111  }
8112 
8113  return a_vs1053b_spi_write_data(handle, buf, len); /* write data */
8114 }
8115 
8129 uint8_t vs1053b_set_reg(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
8130 {
8131  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8132  {
8133  return 2; /* return error */
8134  }
8135  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8136  {
8137  return 3; /* return error */
8138  }
8139  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
8140  {
8141  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
8142 
8143  return 1; /* return error */
8144  }
8145 
8146  return a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, reg, buf, len); /* write data */
8147 }
8148 
8162 uint8_t vs1053b_get_reg(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint8_t reg, uint8_t *buf, uint16_t len)
8163 {
8164  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
8165  {
8166  return 2; /* return error */
8167  }
8168  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
8169  {
8170  return 3; /* return error */
8171  }
8172  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
8173  {
8174  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
8175 
8176  return 1; /* return error */
8177  }
8178 
8179  return a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, reg, buf, len); /* read data */
8180 }
8181 
8190 uint8_t vs1053b_info(vs1053b_info_t *info)
8191 {
8192  if (info == NULL) /* check handle */
8193  {
8194  return 2; /* return error */
8195  }
8196 
8197  memset(info, 0, sizeof(vs1053b_info_t)); /* initialize vs1053b info structure */
8198  strncpy(info->chip_name, CHIP_NAME, 32); /* copy chip name */
8199  strncpy(info->manufacturer_name, MANUFACTURER_NAME, 32); /* copy manufacturer name */
8200  strncpy(info->interface, "SPI", 8); /* copy interface name */
8201  info->supply_voltage_min_v = SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MIN; /* set minimal supply voltage */
8202  info->supply_voltage_max_v = SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MAX; /* set maximum supply voltage */
8203  info->max_current_ma = MAX_CURRENT; /* set maximum current */
8204  info->temperature_max = TEMPERATURE_MAX; /* set minimal temperature */
8205  info->temperature_min = TEMPERATURE_MIN; /* set maximum temperature */
8206  info->driver_version = DRIVER_VERSION; /* set driver version */
8207 
8208  return 0; /* success return 0 */
8209 }
VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF
#define VS1053B_REG_CLOCKF
Definition: driver_vs1053b.c:201
VS1053B_REG_DECODE_TIME
#define VS1053B_REG_DECODE_TIME
Definition: driver_vs1053b.c:202
VS1053B_REG_HDAT0
#define VS1053B_REG_HDAT0
Definition: driver_vs1053b.c:206
VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR
